# <a name="sensitive-information-type-entity-definitions"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-104">敏感信息类型属性定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-104">Sensitive information type entity definitions</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-105">本文列出了所有敏感信息类型实体定义。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-105">This article lists all sensitive information type entity definitions.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-106">每个定义都显示 DLP 策略查找以检测每种类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-106">Each definition shows what a DLP policy looks for to detect each type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-107">若要了解有关敏感信息类型的信息，请参阅 [敏感信息类型](sensitive-information-type-learn-about.md)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-107">To learn more about sensitive information types, see [Sensitive information types](sensitive-information-type-learn-about.md)</span></span>

## <a name="aba-routing-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-108">ABA 路由号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-108">ABA routing number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-109">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-109">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-110">9 个数字，可能采用格式化或无格式模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-110">nine digits that may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-111">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-111">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-112">00-12、21-32、61-72 或 80 之间的两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-112">two digits in the ranges 00-12, 21-32, 61-72, or 80</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-113">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-113">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-114">可选连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-114">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-115">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-115">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-116">可选连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-116">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-117">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-117">a digit</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-118">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-118">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-119">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-119">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-120">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-120">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-121">如果策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则策略具有中等可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-121">A policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-122">函数 Func_aba_routing 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-122">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-123">找到 Keyword_ABA_Routing 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-123">A keyword from Keyword_ABA_Routing is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-124">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-124">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-125">函数 Func_aba_routing 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-125">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- ABA Routing Number -->
    <Entity id="cb353f78-2b72-4c3c-8827-92ebe4f69fdf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ABA_Routing" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="argentina-national-identity-dni-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-143">阿根廷国家/ (DNI) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-143">Argentina national identity (DNI) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-144">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-144">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-145">带或不带句号的八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-145">Eight digits with or without periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-146">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-146">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-147">八个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-147">Eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-148">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-148">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-149">可选时间段</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-149">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-150">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-150">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-151">可选时间段</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-151">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-152">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-152">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-153">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-153">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-154">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-154">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-155">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-155">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-156">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-156">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-157">正则表达式 Regex_argentina_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-157">The regular expression Regex_argentina_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-158">找到 Keyword_argentina_national_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-158">A keyword from Keyword_argentina_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Argentina National Identity (DNI) Number -->
<Entity id="eefbb00e-8282-433c-8620-8f1da3bffdb2" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_argentina_national_id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_argentina_national_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_argentina_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-160">Keyword_argentina_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-160">Keyword_argentina_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-161">Argentina National Identity number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-161">Argentina National Identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-162">cedula</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-162">cedula</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-163">cédula</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-163">cédula</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-164">dni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-164">dni</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-165">documento nacional de identidad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-165">documento nacional de identidad</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-166">documento número</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-166">documento número</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-167">documento numero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-167">documento numero</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-168">registro nacional de las personas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-168">registro nacional de las personas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-169">rnp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-169">rnp</span></span>

## <a name="argentina-unique-tax-identification-key-cuitcuil"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-170">阿根廷唯一税务识别密钥 (CUIT/CUIL) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-170">Argentina Unique Tax Identification Key (CUIT/CUIL)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-171">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-171">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-172">11 个数字（带短划线）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-172">11 digits with dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-173">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-173">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-174">带破折号的 11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-174">11 digits with a dash:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-175">20、23、24、27、30、33 或 34 中的两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-175">two digits in 20, 23, 24, 27, 30, 33 or 34</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-176">连字符 (-) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-176">a hyphen (-)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-177">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-177">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-178">连字符 (-) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-178">a hyphen (-)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-179">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-179">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-180">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-180">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-181">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-181">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-182">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-182">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-183">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-183">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-184">函数 `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-184">The function `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-185">找到 的 `Keyword_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-185">A keyword from `Keyword_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-186">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-186">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-187">函数 `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-187">The function `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Argentina Unique Tax Identification Key (CUIT/CUIL) -->
      <Entity id="98da3da1-9199-4571-b7c4-b6522980b507" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-193">Clave Única de Identificación Tribut一</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-193">Clave Única de Identificación Tributaria</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-194">唯一的树标识代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-194">unique labour identification code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-195">CUIL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-195">CUIL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-196">唯一税务标识密钥</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-196">Unique Tax Identification Key</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-197">唯一的位元标识密钥</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-197">Unique Labour Identification Key</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-199">唯一工作标识代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-199">Unique Work Identification Code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-200">工作标识的唯一代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-200">Unique Code of Work Identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-201">唯一工作标识密钥</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-201">Unique Work Identification Key</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-202">工作标识的唯一密钥</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-202">Unique Key of Work Identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-203">唯一的税务识别代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-203">Unique Code of Tax Identification</span></span>

## <a name="australia-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-226">澳大利亚银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-226">Australia bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-227">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-227">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-228">具有或不带银行省/市/县分支机构号码的 6 到 10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-228">six to 10 digits with or without a bank state branch number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-229">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-229">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-230">帐户号码是 6 到 10 个数字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-230">Account number is 6 to 10 digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-231">澳大利亚银行州级分部编号：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-231">Australia bank state branch number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-232">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-232">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-233">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-233">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-234">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-234">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-235">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-235">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-236">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-236">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-237">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-237">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-238">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-238">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-239">正则表达式Regex_australia_bank_account_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-239">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-240">找到 Keyword_australia_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-240">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-241">正则表达式 Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-241">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-242">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-242">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-243">正则表达式Regex_australia_bank_account_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-243">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-244">找到 Keyword_australia_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-244">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="74a54de9-2a30-4aa0-a8aa-3d9327fc07c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb" />
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
  </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-business-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-260">澳大利亚商务号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-260">Australia business number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-261">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-261">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-262">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-262">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-263">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-263">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-264">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-264">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-265">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-265">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-266">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-266">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-267">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-267">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-268">带可选分隔符的 11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-268">11 digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-269">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-269">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-270">带可选分隔符的 11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-270">11 digits with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-271">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-271">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-272">可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-272">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-273">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-273">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-274">可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-274">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-275">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-275">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-276">可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-276">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-277">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-277">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-278">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-278">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-279">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-279">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-280">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-280">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-281">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-281">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-282">函数Func_australian_business_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-282">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-283">找到来自Keywords_australian_business_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-283">A keyword from Keywords_australian_business_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-284">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-284">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-285">函数Func_australian_business_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-285">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Business Number -->
      <Entity id="76e83b3b-01ee-4530-aced-e667a6609f49" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-company-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-295">澳大利亚公司编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-295">Australia company number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-296">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-296">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-297">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-297">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-298">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-298">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-299">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-299">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-300">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-300">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-301">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-301">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-302">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-302">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-303">九个数字（带分隔符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-303">nine digits with delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-304">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-304">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-305">带分隔符的九个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-305">nine digits with delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-306">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-306">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-307">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-307">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-308">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-308">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-309">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-309">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-310">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-310">three digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-311">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-311">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-312">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-312">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-313">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-313">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-314">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-314">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-315">函数Func_Australian_Company_Number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-315">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-316">找到来自Keyword_Australian_Company_Number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-316">A keyword from Keyword_Australian_Company_Number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-317">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-317">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-318">函数Func_Australian_Company_Number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-318">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Company Number -->
      <Entity id="b1fba4f7-7b3e-4bb9-8f9a-9366df604dbb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-319">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-319">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_australia_company_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-320">Keyword_australia_company_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-320">Keyword_australia_company_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-321">can</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-321">acn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-322">australia company no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-322">australia company no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-323">australia company no#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-323">australia company no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-324">澳大利亚公司编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-324">australia company number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-325">澳大利亚公司否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-325">australian company no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-326">澳大利亚公司否#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-326">australian company no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-327">澳大利亚公司编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-327">australian company number</span></span>

## <a name="australia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-328">澳大利亚驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-328">Australia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-329">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-329">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-330">九个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-330">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-331">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-331">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-332">九个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-332">nine letters and digits:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-333">两个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-333">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-334">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-334">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-335">五个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-335">five digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-336">或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-336">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-337">一到两个可选字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-337">one to two optional letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-338">四到九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-338">four to nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-339">或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-339">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-340">九个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-340">nine digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-341">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-341">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-342">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-342">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-343">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-343">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-344">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-344">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-345">正则表达式 Regex_australia_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-345">The regular expression Regex_australia_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-346">找到 Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-346">A keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-347">未找到 Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-347">No keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Drivers License Number -->
<Entity id="1cbbc8f5-9216-4392-9eb5-5ac2298d1356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-medical-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-447">澳大利亚医疗帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-447">Australia medical account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-448">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-448">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-449">10-11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-449">10-11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-450">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-450">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-451">10-11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-451">10-11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-452">第一个数字范围为 2-6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-452">First digit is in the range 2-6</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-453">第九个数字是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-453">Ninth digit is a check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-454">第十个数字是问题数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-454">Tenth digit is the issue digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-455">第十一个数字（可选）是个人号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-455">Eleventh digit (optional) is the individual number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-456">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-456">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-457">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-457">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-458">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-458">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-459">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-459">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-460">函数 Func_australian_medical_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-460">The function Func_australian_medical_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-461">找到 Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-461">A keyword from Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-462">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-462">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
  <!-- Australia Medical Account Number -->
<Entity id="104a99a0-3d3b-4542-a40d-ab0b9e1efe63" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_medical_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number"/>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-463">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-463">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_australia_medical_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-464">Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-464">Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-465">bank account details</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-465">bank account details</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-466">medicare payments</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-466">medicare payments</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-467">mortgage account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-467">mortgage account</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-468">bank payments</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-468">bank payments</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-469">information branch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-469">information branch</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-470">credit card loan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-470">credit card loan</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-471">department of human services</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-471">department of human services</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-472">local service</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-472">local service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-473">一</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-473">medicare</span></span>


## <a name="australia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-474">澳大利亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-474">Australia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-475">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-475">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-476">八个或九个字母数字字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-476">eight or nine alphanumeric characters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-477">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-477">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-478">一个字母 (N、E、D、F、A、C、U、X) 后跟七个数字或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-478">one letter (N, E, D, F, A, C, U, X) followed by seven digits or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-479">两个字母 (PA、PB、PC、PD、PE、PF、PU、PW、PX、PZ) 后跟七个数字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-479">Two letters (PA, PB, PC, PD, PE, PF, PU, PW, PX, PZ) followed by seven digits.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-480">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-480">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-481">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-481">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-482">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-482">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-483">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-483">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-484">正则表达式查找 `Regex_australia_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-484">The regular expression `Regex_australia_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-485">找到 的 `Keyword_australia_passport_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-485">A keyword from `Keyword_australia_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-486">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-486">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-487">正则表达式查找 `Regex_australia_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-487">The regular expression `Regex_australia_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Australia Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="29869db6-602d-4853-ab93-3484f905df50" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_passport_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-498">passportnumbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-498">passportnumbers</span></span>

## <a name="australia-tax-file-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-507">澳大利亚税务文件编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-507">Australia tax file number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-508">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-508">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-509">八到九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-509">eight to nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-510">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-510">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-511">通常用空格显示八到九个数字，如下所示：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-511">eight to nine digits typically presented with spaces as follows:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-512">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-512">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-513">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-513">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-514">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-514">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-515">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-515">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-516">两到三个数字，其中最后一个数字是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-516">two to three digits where the last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-517">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-517">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-518">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-518">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-519">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-519">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-520">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-520">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-521">函数 Func_australian_tax_file_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-521">The function Func_australian_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-522">未找到 Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number 或 Keyword_number_exclusions 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-522">No keyword from Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number or Keyword_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-523">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-523">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
   <!-- Australia Tax File Number -->
    <Entity id="e29bc95f-ff70-4a37-aa01-04d17360a4c5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_tax_file_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-524">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-524">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_australia_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-525">Keyword_australia_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-525">Keyword_australia_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-526">australian business number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-526">australian business number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-528">medicare levy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-528">medicare levy</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-529">portfolio number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-529">portfolio number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-530">service veterans</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-530">service veterans</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-532">individual tax return</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-532">individual tax return</span></span>

## <a name="austria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-535">奥地利驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-535">Austria driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-536">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-536">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-537">八个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-537">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-538">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-538">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-539">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-539">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-540">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-540">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-541">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-541">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-542">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-542">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-543">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-543">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-544">正则表达式查找  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-544">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-545">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-545">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Austria Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="682f18ce-44eb-482b-8198-2bcb96a0761e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-672">奥地利身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-672">Austria identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-673">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-673">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-674">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-674">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-675">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-675">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-676">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-676">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-677">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-677">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-678">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-678">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-679">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-679">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-680">字母、数字和特殊字符的 24 个字符组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-680">A 24-character combination of letters, digits, and special characters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-681">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-681">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-682">24 个字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-682">24 characters:</span></span>

-  <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-683">22 个字母 (不区分大小写) 数字、反斜杠、正斜杠或加号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-683">22 letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, or plus signs</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-684">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 、数字、反斜杠、正斜杠、加号或等号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-684">two letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, plus signs, or equal signs</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-685">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-685">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-686">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-686">Not applicable</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-687">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-687">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-688">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-688">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-689">正则表达式查找  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-689">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-690">找到 的  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-690">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Austria Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="5ec06c3b-007e-4820-8343-7ff73b889735" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-691">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-691">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-692">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-692">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-693">标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-693">identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-694">national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-694">national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-695">personalaus一sich österreich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-695">personalausweis republik österreich</span></span>

## <a name="austria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-696">奥地利护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-696">Austria passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-697">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-697">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-698">一个字母后跟一个可选空格和七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-698">One letter followed by an optional space and seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-699">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-699">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-700">一个字母、七个数字和一个空格的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-700">A combination of one letter, seven digits, and one space:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-701">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-701">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-702">一个 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-702">one space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-703">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-703">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-704">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-704">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-705">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-705">not applicable</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-706">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-706">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-707">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-707">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-708">正则表达式查找  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-708">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-709">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-709">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-710">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` 格式为 DD.MM.YYYYY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-710">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-711">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-711">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-712">正则表达式查找  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-712">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-713">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-713">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Austria Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="1c96ae4e-303b-447d-86c7-77113ac266bf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-723">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-723">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-724">passportnumbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-724">passportnumbers</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-726">Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-726">Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-727">reisepassnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-727">reisepassnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-728">reisepasse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-728">reisepasse</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-730">Nr-Reisepass</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-730">Nr-Reisepass</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-731">Reisepass-Nr</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-731">Reisepass-Nr</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-732">Passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-732">Passnummer</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_date"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-734">Keywords_eu_passport_date</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-734">Keywords_eu_passport_date</span></span>

## <a name="austria-social-security-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-737">奥地利社会保险号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-737">Austria social security number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-738">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-738">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-739">10 个数字，采用指定格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-739">10 digits in the specified format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-740">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-740">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-741">10 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-741">10 digits:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-742">对应于序列号的三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-742">three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-743">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-743">one check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-744">六个数字，对应于 DDMMYY (出生日期) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-744">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-745">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-745">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-746">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-746">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-747">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-747">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-748">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-748">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-749">函数  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-749">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-750">找到 的  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-750">a keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-751">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-751">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-752">函数  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-752">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Austria Social Security Number -->
      <Entity id="6896a906-86c9-4d19-a2da-6e43ccd19b7b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-753">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-753">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-754">Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-754">Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-755">将 ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-755">austrian ssn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-756">ehic number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-756">ehic number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-757">ehic no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-757">ehic no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-758">insurance code</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-758">insurance code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-759">insurancecode#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-759">insurancecode#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-760">insurance number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-760">insurance number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-761">insurance no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-761">insurance no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-762">kr一nkassennummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-762">krankenkassennummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-763">一名或多名</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-763">krankenversicherung</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-764">socialsecurityno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-764">socialsecurityno</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-765">socialsecurityno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-765">socialsecurityno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-766">social security no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-766">social security no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-767">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-767">social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-768">social security code</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-768">social security code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-769">sozialversicherungsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-769">sozialversicherungsnummer</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-772">sozialesicherheitkein#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-772">sozialesicherheitkein#</span></span>

## <a name="austria-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-778">奥地利税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-778">Austria tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-779">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-779">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-780">九个数字，带可选连字符和正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-780">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-781">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-781">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-782">九个数字，带可选连字符和正斜杠：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-782">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-783">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-783">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-784">连字符 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-784">a hyphen (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-785">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-785">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-786">可选参数， (正斜) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-786">a forward slash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-787">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-787">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-788">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-788">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-789">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-789">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-790">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-790">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-791">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-791">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-792">函数  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-792">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-793">找到 的  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-793">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-794">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-794">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-795">函数  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-795">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Austria Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="4fd58d22-af28-4451-b18a-6f722430a56d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-816">tin#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-816">tin#</span></span>

## <a name="austria-value-added-tax"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-818">奥地利增值税</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-818">Austria value added tax</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-819">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-819">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-820">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-820">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-821">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-821">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-822">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-822">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-823">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-823">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-824">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-824">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-825">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-825">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-826">11 字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-826">11-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-827">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-827">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-828">11 字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-828">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-829">A 或 a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-829">A or a</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-830">T 或 t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-830">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-831">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-831">Optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-832">U 或 u</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-832">U or u</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-833">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-833">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-834">两个或三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-834">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-835">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-835">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-836">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-836">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-837">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-837">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-838">一个或两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-838">one or two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-839">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-839">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-840">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-840">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-841">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-841">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-842">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-842">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-843">函数Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-843">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-844">找到来自Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-844">A keyword from Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-845">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-845">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-846">函数Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-846">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Austria Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="b6a3eda2-c56c-4b69-a5f7-dca34db00f48" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-847">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-847">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_austria_value_added_tax"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-848">Keyword_austria_value_added_tax</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-848">Keyword_austria_value_added_tax</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-849">vat number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-849">vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-850">vat#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-850">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-851">vat number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-851">austrian vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-852">vat no.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-852">vat no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-853">vatno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-853">vatno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-854">增值税编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-854">value added tax number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-855">vat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-855">austrian vat</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-856">mwst</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-856">mwst</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-857">umsatzsteuernummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-857">umsatzsteuernummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-858">mwstnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-858">mwstnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-859">ust.-identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-859">ust.-identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-860">umsatzsteuer-identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-860">umsatzsteuer-identifikationsnummer</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-863">uid number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-863">uid number</span></span>


## <a name="azure-documentdb-auth-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-864">Azure DocumentDB 身份验证密钥</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-864">Azure DocumentDB auth key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-865">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-865">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-866">字符串"DocumentDb"后跟以下模式中列出的字符和字符串。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-866">The string "DocumentDb" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-867">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-867">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-868">字符串"DocumentDb"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-868">The string "DocumentDb"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-869">3-200 位小写或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-869">Any combination of between 3-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-870">大于符号 (>) 、等号 (=) 、引号 (") 或撇号 (') </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-870">A greater than symbol (>), an equal sign (=), a quotation mark ("), or an apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-871">86 个小写或大写字母、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-871">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-872">两个等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-872">Two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-873">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-873">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-874">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-874">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-875">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-875">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-876">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-876">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-877">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-877">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-878">正则表达式CEP_CommonExampleKeywords找不到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-878">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Azure Document DB Auth Key -->
<Entity id="0f587d92-eb28-44a9-bd1c-90f2892b47aa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
          </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
