## <a name="azure-iaas-database-connection-string-and-azure-sql-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-893">Azure IAAS 数据库连接字符串和 Azure SQL连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-893">Azure IAAS database connection string and Azure SQL connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-894">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-894">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-895">字符串"Server"、"server"或"data source"，后跟以下模式中列出的字符和字符串，包括字符串"cloudapp.azure"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-895">The string "Server", "server", or "data source" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-896">com"或"cloudapp.azure"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-896">com" or "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-897">net"或"database.windows"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-897">net" or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-898">net"，字符串"Password"或"password"或"pwd"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-898">net", and the string "Password" or "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-899">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-899">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-900">字符串"Server"、"server"或"data source"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-900">the string "Server", "server", or "data source"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-901">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-901">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-902">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-902">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-903">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-903">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-904">1-200 个小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-904">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-905">字符串"cloudapp.azure"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-905">The string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-906">com"、"cloudapp.azure"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-906">com", "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-907">net"或"database.windows"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-907">net", or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-908">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-908">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-909">1-300 位小写或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-909">any combination of between 1-300 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-910">字符串"Password"、"password"或"pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-910">the string "Password", "password", or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-911">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-911">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-912">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-912">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-913">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-913">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-914">一个或多个不是分号字符 (;) 、引号 (") 或撇 (字符) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-914">one or more characters that aren't a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-915">分号 (;) 、引号 (") 或撇号 (") </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-915">a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-916">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-916">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-917">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-917">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-918">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-918">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-919">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-919">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-920">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-920">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-921">正则表达式CEP_CommonExampleKeywords找不到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-921">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure IAAS Database Connection String and Azure SQL Connection String-->
<Entity id="ce1a126d-186f-4700-8c0c-486157b953fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-931">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-931">127.0.0.1</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-934">s-int。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-934">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-935">net</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-935">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-iot-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-936">Azure IoT连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-936">Azure IoT connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-937">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-937">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-938">字符串"HostName"后跟模式中列出的字符和字符串，包括字符串"azure-devices"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-938">The string "HostName" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the strings "azure-devices.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-939">net"和"SharedAccessKey"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-939">net" and "SharedAccessKey".</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-941">字符串"HostName"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-941">the string "HostName"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-942">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-942">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-943">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-943">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-944">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-944">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-945">1-200 个小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-945">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-946">字符串"azure-devices"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-946">the string "azure-devices.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-947">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-947">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-948">1-200 个小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-948">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-949">字符串"SharedAccessKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-949">the string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-950">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-950">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-951">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-951">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-952">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-952">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-953">43 个小写或大写字母、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-953">any combination of 43 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-954">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-954">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-955">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-955">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-956">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-956">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-957">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-957">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-958">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-958">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-959">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-959">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-960">正则表达式CEP_CommonExampleKeywords找不到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-960">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml

<Entity id="0b34bec3-d5d6-4974-b7b0-dcdb5c90c29d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">

        </Any>

```

## <a name="azure-publish-setting-password"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-975">Azure 发布设置密码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-975">Azure publish setting password</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-976">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-976">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-977">字符串"userpwd="后跟字母数字字符串。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-977">The string "userpwd=" followed by an alphanumeric string.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-978">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-978">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-979">字符串"userpwd="</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-979">the string "userpwd="</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-980">60 个小写字母或数字的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-980">any combination of 60 lowercase letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-981">双引号 (") </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-981">a quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-982">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-982">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-983">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-983">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-984">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-984">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-985">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-985">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-986">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-986">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-987">正则表达式CEP_CommonExampleKeywords找不到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-987">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
<!--Azure Publish Setting Password-->
<Entity id="75f4cc8a-a68e-49e5-89ce-fa8f03d286a5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
       <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords" />
       <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
           <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
       </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-988">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-988">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-994">沙盒</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-994">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-995">onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-995">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-996">localhost</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-996">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-997">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-997">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-998">testacs。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-998">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-999">com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-999">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1000">s-int。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1000">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1001">net</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1001">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-redis-cache-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1002">Azure Redis 缓存连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1002">Azure Redis cache connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1003">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1003">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1004">字符串"redis.cache.windows"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1004">The string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1005">net"，后跟以下模式中列出的字符和字符串，包括字符串"password"或"pwd"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1005">net" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1006">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1006">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1007">字符串"redis.cache.windows"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1007">the string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1008">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1008">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1009">1-200 个小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1009">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1010">字符串"password"或"pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1010">the string "password" or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1011">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1011">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1012">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1012">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1013">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1013">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1014">小写或大写字母、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1014">any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1015">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1015">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1016">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1016">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1017">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1017">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1018">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1018">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1019">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1019">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1020">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1020">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1021">正则表达式CEP_CommonExampleKeywords找不到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1021">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Redis Cache Connection String-->
<Entity id="095a7e6c-efd8-46d5-af7b-5298d53a49fc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="cep_common_example_keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1023">CEP_common_example_keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1023">CEP_common_example_keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1024"> (，从技术上说，此敏感信息类型使用正则表达式（而不是关键字列表）标识这些) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1024">(Technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1029">onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1029">onebox</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1031">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1031">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1032">testacs。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1032">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1033">com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1033">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1034">s-int。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1034">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1035">net</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1035">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-sas"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1036">Azure SAS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1036">Azure SAS</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1037">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1037">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1038">字符串"sig"后跟以下模式中列出的字符和字符串。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1038">The string "sig" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1039">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1039">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1040">字符串"sig"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1040">the string "sig"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1041">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1041">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1042">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1042">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1043">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1043">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1044">小写或大写字母、数字或百分号之间的 43-53 个字符的任意组合 (%) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1044">any combination of between 43-53 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, or the percent sign (%)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1045">字符串"%3d"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1045">the string "%3d"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1046">任何不是小写或大写字母、数字或百分号的字符 (%) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1046">any character that isn't a lower- or uppercase letter, digit, or percent sign (%)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1047">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1047">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1048">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1048">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1049">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1049">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1050">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1050">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1051">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzureSAS查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1051">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureSAS finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure SAS-->
<Entity id="4d235014-e564-47f4-a6fb-6ebb4a826834" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureSAS" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-service-bus-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1052">Azure 服务总线连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1052">Azure service bus connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1053">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1053">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1054">字符串"EndPoint"后跟以下模式中列出的字符和字符串，包括字符串"servicebus.windows"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1054">The string "EndPoint" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the strings "servicebus.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1055">net"和"SharedAccesKey"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1055">net" and "SharedAccesKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1056">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1056">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1057">字符串"EndPoint"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1057">the string "EndPoint"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1058">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1058">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1059">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1059">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1060">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1060">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1061">1-200 个小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1061">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1062">字符串"servicebus.windows"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1062">the string "servicebus.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1063">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1063">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1064">1-200 个小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1064">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1065">字符串"SharedAccessKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1065">the string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1066">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1066">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1067">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1067">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1068">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1068">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1069">小写或大写字母、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1069">any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1070">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1070">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1071">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1071">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1072">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1072">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1073">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1073">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1074">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1074">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1075">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1075">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1076">正则表达式CEP_CommonExampleKeywords找不到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1076">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Service Bus Connection String-->
<Entity id="b9a6578f-a83f-4fcd-bf44-2130bae49a6f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1077">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1077">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_common_example_keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1078">CEP_common_example_keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1078">CEP_common_example_keywords</span></span>

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1091">Azure 存储帐户密钥</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1091">Azure storage account key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1092">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1092">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1093">字符串"DefaultEndpointsProtocol"后跟以下模式中列出的字符和字符串，包括字符串"AccountKey"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1093">The string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "AccountKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1094">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1094">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1095">字符串"DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1095">the string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1096">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1096">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1097">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1097">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1098">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1098">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1099">1-200 个小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1099">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1100">字符串"AccountKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1100">the string "AccountKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1101">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1101">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1102">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1102">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1103">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1103">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1104">小写或大写字母、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1104">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1105">两个等 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1105">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1106">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1106">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1107">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1107">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1108">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1108">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1109">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1109">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1110">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1110">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1111">正则表达式CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter找不到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1111">The regular expression CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1112">正则表达式CEP_CommonExampleKeywords找不到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1112">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key-->
<Entity id="c7bc98e8-551a-4c35-a92d-d2c8cda714a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1113">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1113">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1118"> (，从技术上说，此敏感信息类型使用正则表达式（而不是关键字列表）标识这些) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1118">(Technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1119">contoso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1119">contoso</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1121">northwind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1121">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1122">沙盒</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1122">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1123">onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1123">onebox</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1125">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1125">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1126">testacs。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1126">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1127">com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1127">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1128">s-int。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1128">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1129">net</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1129">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key-generic"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1130">Azure 存储常规 (帐户密钥) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1130">Azure Storage account key (generic)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1131">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1131">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1132">86 个小写或大写字母、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) 的任意组合，前面或后跟以下模式中列出的字符。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1132">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+), preceded or followed by the characters outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1133">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1133">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1134">零到大于符号 (>) 、撇号 (') 、等号 (=) 、引号 (") 或数字符号 (#) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1134">zero to one of the greater than symbol (>), apostrophe ('), equal sign (=), quotation mark ("), or number sign (#)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1135">小写或大写字母、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1135">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1136">两个等 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1136">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1137">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1137">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1138">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1138">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1139">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1139">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1140">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1140">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1141">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1141">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key (Generic)-->
<Entity id="7ff41bd0-5419-4523-91d6-383b3a37f084" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
## <a name="belgium-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1142">比利时驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1142">Belgium driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1143">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1143">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1144">不带空格和分隔符的 10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1144">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1145">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1145">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1146">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1146">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1147">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1147">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1148">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1148">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1149">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1149">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1150">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1150">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1151">正则表达式查找  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1151">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1152">找到 或 `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1152">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Belgium Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d89fd329-9324-433c-b687-2c37bd5166f3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-national-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1285">比利时国家号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1285">Belgium national number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1286">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1286">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1287">11 个数字加上可选的分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1287">11 digits plus optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1288">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1288">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1289">11 个数字加分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1289">11 digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1290">YY 格式的六个数字和两个可选句点。出生日期的 MM.DD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1290">six digits and two optional periods in the format YY.MM.DD for date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1291">点、短划线、空格中的可选分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1291">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1292">三个连续的数字 (男性为奇数，即使对于男性) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1292">three sequential digits (odd for males, even for females)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1293">点、短划线、空格中的可选分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1293">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1294">两个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1294">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1295">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1295">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1296">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1296">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1297">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1297">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1298">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1298">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1299">函数 Func_belgium_national_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1299">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1300">找到 Keyword_belgium_national_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1300">A keyword from Keyword_belgium_national_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1301">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1301">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1302">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1302">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1303">函数 Func_belgium_national_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1303">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1304">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1304">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Belgium National Number -->
       <Entity id="fb969c9e-0fd1-4b18-8091-a2123c5e6a54" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1363">比利时护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1363">Belgium passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1364">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1364">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1365">两个字母后跟 6 个数字，没有空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1365">two letters followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1366">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1366">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1367">两个字母，后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1367">two letters and followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1368">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1368">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1369">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1369">not applicable</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1370">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1370">Definition</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1371">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1371">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1372">正则表达式查找  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1372">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1373">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1373">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1374">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date2` 格式为 DD MM YY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1374">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date2` finds date in the format DD MM YY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1375">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1375">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1376">正则表达式查找  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1376">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1377">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1377">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Belgium Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d7b1315b-21ca-4774-a32a-596010ff78fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date2" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="belgium-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1404">比利时增值税编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1404">Belgium value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1405">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1405">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1406">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1406">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1407">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1407">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1408">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1408">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1409">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1409">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1410">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1410">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1411">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1411">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1412">12 字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1412">12-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1413">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1413">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1414">12 字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1414">12-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1415">字母 B 或 b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1415">a letter B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1416">字母 E 或 e</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1416">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1417">数字 0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1417">a digit 0</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1418">从 1 到 9 的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1418">a digit from 1 to 9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1419">可选点或连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1419">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1420">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1420">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1421">可选点或连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1421">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1422">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1422">four digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1423">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1423">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1424">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1424">Yes</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1425">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1425">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1426">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1426">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1427">函数Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1427">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1428">找到来自Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1428">A keyword from Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1429">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1429">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1430">函数Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1430">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Belgium Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="85b5b3c3-f2de-4ae8-ac46-fd3cb38bf9ed" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1431">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1431">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_belgium_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1432">Keyword_belgium_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1432">Keyword_belgium_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1433">n？ tva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1433">nº tva</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1434">vat number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1434">vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1435">vat no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1435">vat no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1436">numéro t.v.a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1436">numéro t.v.a</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1437">umsatzsteuer-identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1437">umsatzsteuer-identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1438">umsatzsteuernummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1438">umsatzsteuernummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1439">btw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1439">btw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1440">btw#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1440">btw#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1441">vat#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1441">vat#</span></span>


## <a name="brazil-cpf-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1442">巴西 CPF 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1442">Brazil CPF number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1443">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1443">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1444">11 个数字（包括校验位），可以格式化，也可以非格式化</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1444">11 digits that include a check digit and can be formatted or unformatted</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1445">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1445">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1446">格式化：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1446">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1447">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1447">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1448">a period</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1448">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1449">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1449">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1450">a period</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1450">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1451">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1451">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1452">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1452">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1453">两个数字是检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1453">two digits that are check digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1454">无格式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1454">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1455">11 个数字，其中最后两个数字是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1455">11 digits where the last two digits are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1456">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1456">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1457">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1457">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1458">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1458">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1459">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1459">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1460">函数 Func_brazil_cpf 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1460">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1461">找到 Keyword_brazil_cpf 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1461">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cpf is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1462">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1462">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1463">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1463">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1464">函数 Func_brazil_cpf 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1464">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1465">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1465">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil CPF Number -->
<Entity id="78e09124-f2c3-4656-b32a-c1a132cd2711" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1466">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1466">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_brazil_cpf"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1467">Keyword_brazil_cpf</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1467">Keyword_brazil_cpf</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1468">CPF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1468">CPF</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1469">标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1469">Identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1470">注册</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1470">Registration</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1471">收入</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1471">Revenue</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1472">Cadastro de Pessoas Físicas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1472">Cadastro de Pessoas Físicas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1473">中年</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1473">Imposto</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1474">Identificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1474">Identificação</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1475">Inscrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1475">Inscrição</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1476">Receita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1476">Receita</span></span>


## <a name="brazil-legal-entity-number-cnpj"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1477">CNPJ (巴西法律实体) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1477">Brazil legal entity number (CNPJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1478">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1478">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1479">14 个数字（包括注册号、分行号码和校验位），再加上分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1479">14 digits that include a registration number, branch number, and check digits, plus delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1480">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1480">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1481">14 个数字，再加上分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1481">14 digits, plus delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1482">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1482">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1483">a period</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1483">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1484">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1484">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1485">a period</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1485">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1486">三个数字 (前八个数字是注册号码) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1486">three digits (these first eight digits are the registration number)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1487">正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1487">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1488">四位数分支号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1488">four-digit branch number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1489">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1489">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1490">两个数字是检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1490">two digits that are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1491">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1491">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1492">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1492">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1493">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1493">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1494">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1494">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1495">函数 Func_brazil_cnpj 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1495">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1496">找到 Keyword_brazil_cnpj 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1496">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cnpj is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1497">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1497">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1498">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1498">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1499">函数 Func_brazil_cnpj 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1499">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1500">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1500">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil Legal Entity Number (CNPJ) -->
<Entity id="9b58b5cd-5e90-4df6-b34f-1ebcc88ceae4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_brazil_cnpj"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1502">Keyword_brazil_cnpj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1502">Keyword_brazil_cnpj</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1505">CNPJ-MF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1505">CNPJ-MF</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1506">National Registry of Legal Entities</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1506">National Registry of Legal Entities</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1508">Legal entity</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1508">Legal entity</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1509">Legal entities</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1509">Legal entities</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1510">Registration Status</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1510">Registration Status</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1511">商业版</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1511">Business</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1512">公司</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1512">Company</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1513">CNPJ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1513">CNPJ</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1514">Cadastro Nacional da Pessoa Jurídica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1514">Cadastro Nacional da Pessoa Jurídica</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1515">Cadastro Geral de Contribuintes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1515">Cadastro Geral de Contribuintes</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1516">CGC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1516">CGC</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1517">Pessoa jurídica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1517">Pessoa jurídica</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1518">Pessoas jurídicas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1518">Pessoas jurídicas</span></span>

## <a name="brazil-national-identification-card-rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1522">巴西国家身份证 (RG) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1522">Brazil national identification card (RG)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1523">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1523">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1524">Registro Geral (旧格式) ：九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1524">Registro Geral (old format): Nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1525">Registro de Identidade (RIC)  (新格式) ：11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1525">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format): 11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1526">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1526">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1527">Registro Geral（旧格式）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1527">Registro Geral (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1528">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1528">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1529">a period</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1529">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1530">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1530">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1531">a period</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1531">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1532">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1532">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1533">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1533">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1534">一个数字，是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1534">one digit that is a check digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1535">Registro de Identidade (RIC)  (新格式) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1535">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1536">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1536">10 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1537">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1537">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1538">一个数字，是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1538">one digit that is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1539">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1539">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1540">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1540">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1541">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1541">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1542">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1542">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1543">函数 Func_brazil_rg 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1543">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1544">找到 Keyword_brazil_rg 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1544">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_rg is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1545">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1545">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
      <!-- Brazil National ID Card (RG) -->
      <Entity id="486de900-db70-41b3-a886-abdf25af119c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_rg" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1546">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1546">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_brazil_rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1547">Keyword_brazil_rg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1547">Keyword_brazil_rg</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1548">Cédula de identidade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1548">Cédula de identidade</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1549">identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1549">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1550">national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1550">national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1551">número de rregistro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1551">número de rregistro</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1552">registro de Iidentidade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1552">registro de Iidentidade</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1553">registro geral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1553">registro geral</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1554">RG (关键字区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1554">RG (this keyword is case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1555">RIC (关键字区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1555">RIC (this keyword is case-sensitive)</span></span>


## <a name="bulgaria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1556">保加利亚驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1556">Bulgaria driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1557">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1557">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1558">九个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1558">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1559">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1559">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1560">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1560">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1561">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1561">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1562">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1562">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1563">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1563">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1564">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1564">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1565">正则表达式查找  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1565">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1566">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1566">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="66d39258-94c2-43b2-804b-aa312258e54b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="bulgaria-uniform-civil-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1693">保加利亚统一编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1693">Bulgaria uniform civil number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1694">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1694">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1695">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1695">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1696">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1696">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1697">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1697">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1698">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1698">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1699">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1699">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1700">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1700">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1701">不带空格和分隔符的 10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1701">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1702">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1702">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1703">不带空格和分隔符的 10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1703">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1704">六个数字，对应于 YYMMDD (出生日期) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1704">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1705">两个数字，对应于出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1705">two digits that correspond to the birth order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1706">对应于性别的一个数字：男性的偶数位数和男性的奇数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1706">one digit that corresponds to gender: An even digit for male and an odd digit for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1707">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1707">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1708">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1708">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1709">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1709">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1710">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1710">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1711">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1711">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1712">函数  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1712">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1713">找到 的  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1713">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1714">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1714">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1715">函数  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1715">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Uniform Civil Number -->
      <Entity id="100d58b1-0a35-4fb1-aa89-e4a86fb53fcc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
