- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1756">униформ граждански не</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1756">униформ граждански не</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1757">униформ граждански номер</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1757">униформ граждански номер</span></span>

## <a name="bulgaria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1760">保加利亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1760">Bulgaria passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1761">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1761">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1762">九个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1762">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1763">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1763">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1764">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1764">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1765">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1765">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1766">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1766">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1767">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1767">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1768">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1768">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1769">正则表达式查找  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1769">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1770">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1770">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1771">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` 格式为 DD.MM.YYYYY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1771">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1772">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1772">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1773">正则表达式查找  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1773">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1774">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1774">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="f7172b82-c588-4216-845e-4e54e397f29a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1775">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1775">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1776">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1776">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1779">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1779">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1780">passports</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1780">passports</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1781">passportno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1781">passportno</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1782">passport no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1782">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1783">passportnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1783">passportnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1784">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1784">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1785">passportnumbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1785">passportnumbers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1786">passport numbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1786">passport numbers</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1787">Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1787">Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1788">номер на паспорта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1788">номер на паспорта</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1789">номер на паспорт</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1789">номер на паспорт</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1790">均？</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1790">паспорт №</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_date"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1791">Keywords_eu_passport_date</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1791">Keywords_eu_passport_date</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1793">到期日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1793">date of expiry</span></span>

## <a name="canada-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1794">加拿大银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1794">Canada bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1795">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1795">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1796">7 个或 12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1796">7 or 12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1797">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1797">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1798">加拿大银行帐号是 7 个或 12 个数字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1798">A Canada Bank Account Number is 7 or 12 digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1799">加拿大银行帐户的银行代号是：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1799">A Canada bank account transit number is:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1800">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1800">five digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1801">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1801">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1802">三个数字 OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1802">three digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1803">零"0"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1803">a zero "0"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1804">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1804">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1805">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1805">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1806">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1806">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1807">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1807">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1808">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1808">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1809">正则表达式 Regex_canada_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1809">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1810">找到 Keyword_canada_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1810">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1811">正则表达式 Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1811">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1812">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1812">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1813">正则表达式 Regex_canada_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1813">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1814">找到 Keyword_canada_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1814">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="552e814c-cb50-4d94-bbaa-bb1d1ffb34de" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number" />
   </Pattern>
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1838">加拿大驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1838">Canada driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1839">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1839">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1840">因省而异</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1840">Varies by province</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1841">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1841">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1842">各种模式涵盖：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1842">Various patterns covering:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1843">省/市/市</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1843">Alberta</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1844">British Columbia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1844">British Columbia</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1845">马尼托巴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1845">Manitoba</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1846">New Brunswick</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1846">New Brunswick</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1847">Newfoundland/Labrador</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1847">Newfoundland/Labrador</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1848">Nova Scotia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1848">Nova Scotia</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1849">On一</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1849">Ontario</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1850">Prince Edward Island</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1850">Prince Edward Island</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1851">因此，该国家/</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1851">Quebec</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1852">Saskatchewan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1852">Saskatchewan</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1853">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1853">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1854">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1854">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1855">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1855">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1856">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1856">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1857">函数 Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1857">The function Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1858">找到 Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1858">A keyword from Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1859">找到 Keyword_canada_drivers_license 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1859">A keyword from Keyword_canada_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="37186abb-8e48-4800-ad3c-e3d1610b3db0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_alberta_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_alberta_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_british_columbia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_british_columbia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_manitoba_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_manitoba_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_brunswick_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_brunswick_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_nova_scotia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_nova_scotia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ontario_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ontario_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_quebec_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_quebec_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_saskatchewan_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_saskatchewan_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1995">加拿大卫生服务号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1995">Canada health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1996">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1996">Format</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1997">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1997">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1998">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1998">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-1999">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-1999">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2000">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2000">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2001">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2001">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2002">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2002">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2003">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2003">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2004">正则表达式 Regex_canada_health_service_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2004">The regular expression Regex_canada_health_service_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2005">找到 Keyword_canada_health_service_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2005">A keyword from Keyword_canada_health_service_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Health Service Number -->
<Entity id="59c0bf39-7fab-482c-af25-00faa4384c94" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_health_service_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_health_service_number" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2006">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2006">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2008">personal health number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2008">personal health number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2009">patient information</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2009">patient information</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2010">health services</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2010">health services</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2011">speciality services</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2011">speciality services</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2014">一些</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2014">psychiatrist</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2015">workers compensation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2015">workers compensation</span></span>

## <a name="canada-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2017">加拿大护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2017">Canada passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2018">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2018">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2019">两个小写字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2019">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2020">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2020">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2021">两个小写字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2021">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2022">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2022">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2023">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2023">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2024">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2024">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2025">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2025">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2026">正则表达式 Regex_canada_passport_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2026">The regular expression Regex_canada_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2027">找到来自Keyword_canada_passport_number或Keyword_passport关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2027">A keyword from Keyword_canada_passport_number or Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Passport Number -->
<Entity id="14d0db8b-498a-43ed-9fca-f6097ae687eb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-personal-health-identification-number-phin"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2057">加拿大个人健康标识号 (PHIN) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2057">Canada personal health identification number (PHIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2058">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2058">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2059">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2059">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2060">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2060">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2061">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2061">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2062">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2062">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2063">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2063">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2064">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2064">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2065">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2065">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2066">正则表达式 Regex_canada_phin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2066">The regular expression Regex_canada_phin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2067">至少找到了两个来自Keyword_canada_phin或Keyword_canada_provinces关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2067">At least two keywords from Keyword_canada_phin or Keyword_canada_provinces are found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada PHIN -->
<Entity id="722e12ac-c89a-4ec8-a1b7-fea3469f89db" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_phin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_phin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_provinces" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-social-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2100">加拿大社会保险号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2100">Canada social insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2101">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2101">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2102">九个数字（可选连字符或空格）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2102">nine digits with optional hyphens or spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2103">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2103">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2104">格式化：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2104">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2105">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2105">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2106">连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2106">a hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2107">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2107">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2108">连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2108">a hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2109">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2109">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2110">无格式：九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2110">Unformatted: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2111">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2111">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2112">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2112">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2113">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2113">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2114">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2114">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2115">函数 Func_canadian_sin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2115">The function Func_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2116">至少以下两种模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2116">At least two of the following patterns:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2117">找到 Keyword_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2117">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2118">找到 Keyword_sin_collaborative 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2118">A keyword from Keyword_sin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2119">函数 Func_eu_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2119">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2120">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2120">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2121">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2121">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2122">函数 Func_unformatted_canadian_sin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2122">The function Func_unformatted_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2123">找到 Keyword_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2123">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2124">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2124">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="a2f29c85-ecb8-4514-a610-364790c0773e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_canadian_sin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_canadian_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="chile-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2149">智利身份证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2149">Chile identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2150">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2150">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2151">七到八个数字加上分隔符一个检查数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2151">seven to eight digits plus delimiters a check digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2152">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2152">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2153">七到八个数字加分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2153">seven to eight digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2154">一到两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2154">one to two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2155">可选时间段</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2155">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2156">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2156">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2157">可选时间段</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2157">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2158">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2158">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2159">短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2159">a dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2160">一个数字或 (不区分大小写) 一个数字或字母，这是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2160">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2161">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2161">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2162">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2162">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2163">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2163">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2164">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2164">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2165">函数 Func_chile_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2165">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2166">找到 Keyword_chile_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2166">A keyword from Keyword_chile_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2167">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2167">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2168">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2168">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2169">函数 Func_chile_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2169">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2170">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2170">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Chile Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="4e979794-49a0-407e-a0b9-2c536937b925" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2197">唯一税务注册表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2197">Unique Tax Registry</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2198">唯一的三元角色</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2198">Unique Tributary Role</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2199">唯一税务角色</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2199">Unique Tax Role</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2200">唯一的三元数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2200">Unique Tributary Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2201">唯一国家/区号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2201">Unique National Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2202">唯一的国家角色</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2202">Unique National Role</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2203">国家/地区唯一角色</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2203">National unique role</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2206">智利标识#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2206">Chile identity #</span></span>


## <a name="china-resident-identity-card-prc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2207">中国居民身份证 (中国) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2207">China resident identity card (PRC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2208">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2208">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2209">18 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2209">18 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2210">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2210">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2211">18 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2211">18 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2212">六个数字，表示地址代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2212">six digits that are an address code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2213">八个数字，格式为 YYYYMMDD，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2213">eight digits in the form YYYYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2214">三个数字，表示订单代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2214">three digits that are an order code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2215">一个数字，是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2215">one digit that is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2216">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2216">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2217">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2217">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2218">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2218">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2219">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2219">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2220">函数 Func_china_resident_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2220">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2221">找到 Keyword_china_resident_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2221">A keyword from Keyword_china_resident_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2222">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2222">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2223">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2223">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2224">函数 Func_china_resident_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2224">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2225">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2225">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- China Resident Identity Card (PRC) Number -->
<Entity id="c92daa86-2d16-4871-901f-816b3f554fc1" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2226">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2226">Keywords</span></span>

### <a name="keyword_china_resident_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2227">Keyword_china_resident_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2227">Keyword_china_resident_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2228">Resident Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2228">Resident Identity Card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2229">中国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2229">PRC</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2230">National Identification Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2230">National Identification Card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2231">身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2231">身份证</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2232">居民 身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2232">居民 身份证</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2233">居民身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2233">居民身份证</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2234">鉴定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2234">鉴定</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2235">身分證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2235">身分證</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2236">居民身份證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2236">居民 身份證</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2237">鑑定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2237">鑑定</span></span>


## <a name="credit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2238">信用卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2238">Credit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2239">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2239">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2240">14 到 16 个数字，可以格式化或无格式 (dddddd) 且必须通过 Luhn 测试。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2240">14 to 16 digits that can be formatted or unformatted (dddddddddddddddd) and that must pass the Luhn test.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2241">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2241">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2242">检测来自全球所有主要品牌的卡，包括 Visa、MasterCard、Discover Card、JCB、American Express、名片和第三者卡。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2242">Detects cards from all major brands worldwide, including Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, gift cards, and diner cards.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2243">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2243">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2244">是，Luhn 校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2244">Yes, the Luhn checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2245">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2245">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2246">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2246">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2247">函数 Func_credit_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2247">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2248">下列其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2248">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2249">找到 Keyword_cc_verification 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2249">A keyword from Keyword_cc_verification is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2250">找到 Keyword_cc_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2250">A keyword from Keyword_cc_name is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2251">函数 Func_expiration_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2251">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2252">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2252">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2253">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2253">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2254">函数 Func_credit_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2254">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2255">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2255">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Credit Card Number -->
<Entity id="50842eb7-edc8-4019-85dd-5a5c1f2bb085" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_verification" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_name" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2515">克罗地亚驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2515">Croatia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2516">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2516">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2517">八个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2517">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2518">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2518">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2519">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2519">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2520">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2520">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2521">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2521">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2522">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2522">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2523">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2523">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2524">正则表达式查找  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2524">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2525">找到 或 `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2525">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="005b3ef1-47dd-4e68-bb02-c6db484d00f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2649">克罗地亚身份证号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2649">Croatia identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2650">此实体包含在欧盟国家标识号敏感信息类型中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2650">This entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2651">它作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2651">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2652">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2652">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2653">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2653">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2654">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2654">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2655">九个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2655">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2656">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2656">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2657">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2657">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2658">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2658">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2659">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2659">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2660">函数 Func_croatia_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2660">The function Func_croatia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2661">找到 Keyword_croatia_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2661">A keyword from Keyword_croatia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Croatia Identity Card Number-->
<Entity id="ff12f884-c20a-4189-b185-34c8e7258d47" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_croatia_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2692">克罗地亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2692">Croatia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2693">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2693">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2694">九个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2694">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2695">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2695">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2696">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2696">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2697">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2697">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2698">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2698">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2699">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2699">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2700">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2700">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2701">正则表达式查找  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2701">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2702">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2702">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2703">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` 格式为 DD.MM.YYYYY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2703">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2704">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2704">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2705">正则表达式查找  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2705">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2706">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2706">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7d7a729d-32d8-4204-8d01-d5e6a6c25581" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2707">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2707">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2711">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2711">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2712">passports</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2712">passports</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2717">passportnumbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2717">passportnumbers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2718">passport numbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2718">passport numbers</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2719">Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2719">Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2720">broj putov一</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2720">broj putovnice</span></span>

## <a name="croatia-personal-identification-oib-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2724">克罗地亚个人标识 (OIB) 号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2724">Croatia personal identification (OIB) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2725">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2725">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2726">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2726">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2727">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2727">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2728">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2728">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2729">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2729">10 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2730">最终数字是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2730">final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2731">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2731">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2732">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2732">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2733">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2733">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2734">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2734">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2735">函数 Func_croatia_oib_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2735">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2736">找到来自Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2736">A keyword from Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2737">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2737">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2738">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2738">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2739">函数 Func_croatia_oib_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2739">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2740">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2740">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Personal Identification (OIB) Number -->
      <Entity id="31983b6d-db95-4eb2-a630-b44bd091968d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2771">塞浦路斯驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2771">Cyprus drivers license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2772">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2772">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2773">不带空格和分隔符的 12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2773">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2774">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2774">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2775">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2775">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2776">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2776">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2777">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2777">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2778">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2778">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2779">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2779">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2780">正则表达式查找  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2780">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2781">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2781">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="356fa104-f9ac-4aff-a0e4-2e6e65ea06c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2782">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2782">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2914">不带空格和分隔符的 10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2914">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2915">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2915">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2916">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2916">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2917">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2917">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2918">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2918">not applicable</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2919">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2919">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2920">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2920">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2921">正则表达式查找  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2921">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2922">找到 的  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2922">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="3ba8afe5-7a6c-4929-8247-0001b6878438" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2923">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2923">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2924">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2924">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2925">id card number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2925">id card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2926">标识卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2926">identity card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2927">kim且 karti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2927">kimlik karti</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2928">national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2928">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2929">个人 ID 号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2929">personal id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2930">ταυτοτητασ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2930">ταυτοτητασ</span></span>


## <a name="cyprus-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2931">塞浦路斯护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2931">Cyprus passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2932">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2932">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2933">一个字母后跟 6-8 个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2933">one letter followed by 6-8 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2934">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2934">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2935">一个字母后跟六到八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2935">one letter followed by six to eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2936">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2936">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2937">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2937">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2938">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2938">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2939">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2939">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2940">正则表达式查找  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2940">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2941">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2941">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2942">正则表达式查找 `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date` DD/MM/YYYY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2942">The regular expression `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD/MM/YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2943">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2943">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2944">正则表达式查找  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2944">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2945">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2945">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="9193e2e8-7f8c-43c1-a274-ac40d651936f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2962">κυπριακό διαβατήριο</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2962">κυπριακό διαβατήριο</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2963">διαβατήριο#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2963">διαβατήριο#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2964">διαβατήριο</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2964">διαβατήριο</span></span>

## <a name="cyprus-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2974">塞浦路斯税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2974">Cyprus tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2975">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2975">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2976">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2976">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2977">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2977">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2978">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2978">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2979">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2979">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2980">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2980">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2981">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2981">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2982">指定模式中的八个数字和一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2982">eight digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2983">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2983">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2984">八个数字和一个字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2984">eight digits and one letter:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2985">"0"或"9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2985">a "0" or "9"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2986">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2986">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2987">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2987">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2988">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2988">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2989">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2989">not applicable</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2990">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2990">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2991">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2991">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2992">函数  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2992">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2993">找到 的  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2993">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2994">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2994">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2995">函数  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2995">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="40e64bd9-55f3-4a09-9bd6-1db18dced9dd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2996">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2996">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2997">Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2997">Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-2998">tax id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-2998">tax id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3000">tax identification no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3000">tax identification no</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3007">一些#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3007">taxidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3008">一些#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3008">taxidnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3009">taxno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3009">taxno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3010">taxnumber#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3010">taxnumber#</span></span>

## <a name="czech-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3023">捷克驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3023">Czech driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3024">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3024">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3025">两个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3025">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3026">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3026">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3027">八个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3027">eight letters and digits:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3028">字母"E" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3028">letter 'E' (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3029">一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3029">a letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3030">一个 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3030">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3031">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3031">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3032">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3032">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3033">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3033">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3034">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3034">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3035">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3035">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3036">正则表达式查找  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3036">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3037">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3037">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <Entity id="86b40d3b-d8ea-4c36-aab0-ef9416a6769c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```
