## <a name="czech-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3163">捷克护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3163">Czech passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3164">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3164">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3165">八个数字，不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3165">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3166">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3166">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3167">八个数字，不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3167">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3168">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3168">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3169">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3169">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3170">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3170">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3171">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3171">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3172">正则表达式查找  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3172">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3173">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3173">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3174">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` 格式为 DD.MM.YYYYY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3174">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3175">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3175">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3176">正则表达式查找  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3176">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3177">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3177">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Czech Republic Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7bcd8ce8-5e92-4bbe-bc92-fa669f0369fa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-personal-identity-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3199">捷克个人标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3199">Czech personal identity number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3200">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3200">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3201">九个数字，带可选正斜杠 (旧格式) 10 个数字，带可选正斜杠 (新格式) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3201">nine digits with optional forward slash (old format) 10 digits with optional forward slash (new format)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3202">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3202">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3203">九个数字 (旧格式) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3203">nine digits (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3204">六个数字，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3204">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3205">可选正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3205">an optional forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3206">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3206">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3207">10 个数字 (新格式) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3207">10 digits (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3208">六个数字，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3208">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3209">可选正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3209">an optional forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3210">四个数字，其中最后一个数字是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3210">four digits where last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3211">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3211">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3212">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3212">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3213">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3213">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3214">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3214">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3215">函数 Func_czech_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3215">The function Func_czech_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3216">找到 Keyword_czech_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3216">A keyword from Keyword_czech_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3217">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3217">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3218">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3218">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3219">函数Func_czech_id_card_new_format查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3219">The function Func_czech_id_card_new_format finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3220">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3220">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <Entity id="60c0725a-4eb6-455b-9dda-05d8a7396497" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_czech_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3000.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
            <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card_new_format" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3228">identity no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3228">identity no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3229">标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3229">identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3230">identityno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3230">identityno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3231">identityno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3231">identityno</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3232">insurance number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3232">insurance number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3233">national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3233">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3234">nationalnumber#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3234">nationalnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3235">national number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3235">national number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3236">osobní ííslo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3236">osobní číslo</span></span>

## <a name="denmark-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3267">丹麦驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3267">Denmark driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3268">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3268">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3269">八个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3269">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3270">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3270">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3271">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3271">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3272">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3272">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3273">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3273">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3274">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3274">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3275">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3275">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3276">正则表达式查找  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3276">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3277">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3277">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Denmark Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="98a95812-6203-451a-a220-d39870ebef0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3401">丹麦护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3401">Denmark passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3402">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3402">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3403">九个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3403">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3404">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3404">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3405">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3405">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3406">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3406">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3407">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3407">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3408">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3408">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3409">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3409">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3410">正则表达式查找  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3410">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3411">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3411">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3412">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date2` 格式为 DD MM YY 的日期或 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 找到的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3412">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date2` finds date in the format DD MM YY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3413">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3413">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3414">正则表达式查找  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3414">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3415">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3415">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Denmark Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="25e8c47e-e6fe-4884-a211-74898f8c0196" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date2" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="denmark-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3435">丹麦个人标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3435">Denmark personal identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3436">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3436">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3437">10 个数字，包含连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3437">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3438">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3438">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3439">10 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3439">10 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3440">六个数字，格式为 DDMMYY，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3440">six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3441">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3441">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3442">四个数字，其中最后一个数字是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3442">four digits where the final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3443">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3443">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3444">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3444">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3445">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3445">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3446">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3446">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3447">正则表达式Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3447">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3448">找到 Keyword_denmark_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3448">A keyword from Keyword_denmark_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3449">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3449">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3450">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3450">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3451">正则表达式Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3451">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3452">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3452">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
    <!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="6c4f2fef-56e1-4c00-8093-88d7a01cf460" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_denmark_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="drug-enforcement-agency-dea-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3524">管制局 (DEA) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3524">Drug Enforcement Agency (DEA) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3525">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3525">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3526">两个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3526">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3527">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3527">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3528">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3528">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3529">一个字母 (可能) 不区分大小写：abcdefghjklmnprstux，这是一个注册表代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3529">one letter (not case-sensitive) from this set of possible letters: abcdefghjklmnprstux, which is a registrant code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3530">一个字母 (不区分大小写) ，即注册人姓氏或数字"9"的第一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3530">one letter (not case-sensitive), which is the first letter of the registrant's last name or digit '9'</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3531">七个数字，最后一个数字是检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3531">seven digits, the last of which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3532">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3532">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3533">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3533">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3534">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3534">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3535">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3535">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3536">函数 Func_dea_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3536">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3537">找到的 `Keyword_dea_number` 关键字来自</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3537">A keyword from `Keyword_dea_number` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3538">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3538">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3539">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3539">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3540">函数 Func_dea_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3540">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3541">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3541">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- DEA Number -->
    <Entity id="9a5445ad-406e-43eb-8bd7-cac17ab6d0e4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
      </Pattern>
      <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.1207.000" maxEngineVersion="15.20.3134.000">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Version>
      <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3135.000">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_dea_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Version>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3542">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3542">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_dea_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3543">Keyword_dea_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3543">Keyword_dea_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3544">dea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3544">dea</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3545">dea#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3545">dea#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3546">一些强制执行管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3546">drug enforcement administration</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3547">犯罪管制机构</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3547">drug enforcement agency</span></span>


## <a name="estonia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3548">爱沙尼亚驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3548">Estonia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3549">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3549">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3550">两个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3550">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3551">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3551">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3552">两个字母和六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3552">two letters and six digits:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3553">字母"ET" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3553">the letters "ET" (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3554">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3554">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3555">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3555">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3556">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3556">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3557">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3557">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3558">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3558">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3559">正则表达式查找  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3559">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3560">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3560">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Estonia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="51da8171-da70-4cc1-9d65-055a59ca4f83" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-personal-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3686">爱沙尼亚个人标识代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3686">Estonia Personal Identification Code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3687">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3687">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3688">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3688">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3689">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3689">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3690">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3690">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3691">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3691">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3692">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3692">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3693">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3693">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3694">11 个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3694">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3695">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3695">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3696">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3696">11 digits:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3697">一个数字，对应于性生活和年龄 (奇数男性，偶数男性;1-2：19 世纪;3-4：20 世纪;5-6：21 世纪) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3697">one digit that corresponds to sex and century of birth (odd number male, even number female; 1-2: 19th century; 3-4: 20th century; 5-6: 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3698">六个数字，对应于 YYMMDD (出生日期) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3698">six digits that correspond to date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3699">三个数字，对应于同一日期出生日期的分隔人的序列号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3699">three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3700">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3700">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3701">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3701">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3702">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3702">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3703">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3703">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3704">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3704">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3705">函数  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3705">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3706">找到 的  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3706">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3707">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3707">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3708">函数  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3708">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Estonia Personal Identification Code -->
      <Entity id="bfb26de6-dad5-4d48-ab72-4789cdd0654c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3741">爱沙尼亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3741">Estonia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3742">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3742">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3743">一个字母后跟七个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3743">one letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3744">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3744">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3745">一个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3745">one letter followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3746">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3746">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3747">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3747">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3748">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3748">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3749">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3749">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3750">正则表达式查找  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3750">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3751">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3751">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3752">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` 格式为 DD.MM.YYYYY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3752">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3753">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3753">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3754">正则表达式查找  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3754">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3755">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3755">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Estonia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="61f7073a-509e-425b-a754-bc01bb5d5b8c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number_common"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3757">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3757">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3769">eesti kodaniku passi number passinumbrid document number document no dokumendi nr</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3769">eesti kodaniku pass passi number passinumbrid document number document no dokumendi nr</span></span>

## <a name="eu-debit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3773">欧盟借记卡号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3773">EU debit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3774">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3774">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3775">16 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3775">16 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3776">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3776">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3777">复杂而可靠的模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3777">Complex and robust pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3778">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3778">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3779">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3779">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3780">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3780">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3781">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3781">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3782">函数 Func_eu_debit_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3782">The function Func_eu_debit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3783">下列至少其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3783">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3784">找到 Keyword_eu_debit_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3784">A keyword from Keyword_eu_debit_card is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3785">找到 Keyword_card_terms_dict 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3785">A keyword from Keyword_card_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3786">找到 Keyword_card_security_terms_dict 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3786">A keyword from Keyword_card_security_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3787">找到 Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3787">A keyword from Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3788">函数 Func_expiration_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3788">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3789">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3789">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- EU Debit Card Number -->
    <Entity id="0e9b3178-9678-47dd-a509-37222ca96b42" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_eu_debit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_eu_debit_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_security_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3790">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3790">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3798">acct nbr</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3798">acct nbr</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-3800">acct no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-3800">acct no</span></span>

## <a name="finland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4236">芬兰驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4236">Finland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4237">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4237">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4238">10 个数字，包含连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4238">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4239">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4239">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4240">10 个数字，包含连字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4240">10 digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4241">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4241">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4242">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4242">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4243">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4243">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4244">数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4244">a digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4245">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4245">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4246">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4246">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4247">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4247">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4248">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4248">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4249">正则表达式查找  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4249">The regular expression  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4250">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4250">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="bb3b27a3-79bd-4ac4-81a7-f9fca3c7d1a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-european-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4381">芬兰欧洲健康保险号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4381">Finland european health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4382">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4382">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4383">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4383">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4384">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4384">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4385">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4385">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4386">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4386">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4387">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4387">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4388">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4388">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4389">20 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4389">20-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4390">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4390">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4391">20 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4391">20-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4392">10 个数字 - 8024680246</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4392">10 digits - 8024680246</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4393">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4393">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4394">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4394">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4395">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4395">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4396">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4396">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4397">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4397">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4398">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4398">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4399">正则表达式Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4399">The regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4400">找到来自Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4400">A keyword from Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland European Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="60f75aed-81bf-4625-89b0-0846b9248ee7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4418">芬兰国家/区 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4418">Finland national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4419">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4419">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4420">六个数字加一个字符，表示一世纪加三个数字加一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4420">six digits plus a character indicating a century plus three digits plus a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4421">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4421">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4422">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4422">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4423">六个数字，格式为 DDMMYY，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4423">six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are a date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4424">century marker (either '-'， '+' or 'a') </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4424">century marker (either '-', '+' or 'a')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4425">三位数的个人标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4425">three-digit personal identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4426">一个数字或 (不区分大小写) 检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4426">a digit or letter (case insensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4427">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4427">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4428">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4428">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4429">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4429">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4430">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4430">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4431">函数Func_finnish_national_id查找与模式匹配的内容</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4431">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4432">找到来自Keyword_finnish_national_id的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4432">a keyword from Keyword_finnish_national_id is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4433">校验和传递</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4433">the checksum passes</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4434">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4434">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4435">函数Func_finnish_national_id查找与模式匹配的内容</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4435">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4436">校验和传递</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4436">the checksum passes</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finnish National ID-->
      <Entity id="338FD995-4CB5-4F87-AD35-79BD1DD926C1" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4485">芬兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4485">Finland passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4486">此实体在欧盟护照号码敏感信息类型中可用，并作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4486">This entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4487">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4487">Format</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4488">九个字母和数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4488">combination of nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4489">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4489">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4490">九个字母和数字的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4490">combination of nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4491">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4491">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4492">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4492">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4493">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4493">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4494">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4494">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4495">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4495">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4496">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4496">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4497">正则表达式查找 `Regex_finland_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4497">The regular expression `Regex_finland_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4498">找到 或 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keyword_finland_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4498">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_finland_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4499">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` 格式为 DD.MM.YYYYY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4499">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4500">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4500">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4501">正则表达式查找 `Regex_finland_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4501">The regular expression `Regex_finland_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4502">找到 或 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keyword_finland_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4502">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_finland_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d1685ac3-1d3a-40f8-8198-32ef5669c7a5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_finland_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4515">Keyword_finland_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4515">Keyword_finland_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4516">suomalainen passi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4516">suomalainen passi</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4519">passin numero#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4519">passin numero#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4520">passin numero。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4520">passin numero.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4521">passi#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4521">passi#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4522">passi number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4522">passi number</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_date"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4523">Keywords_eu_passport_date</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4523">Keywords_eu_passport_date</span></span>

## <a name="france-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4526">法国驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4526">France driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4527">此实体在欧盟驾驶证号码敏感信息类型中可用，并作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4527">This entity is available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4528">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4528">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4529">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4529">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4530">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4530">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4531">12 个数字，会对类似模式（如法国电话号码）进行验证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4531">12 digits with validation to discount similar patterns such as French telephone numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4532">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4532">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4533">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4533">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4534">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4534">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4535">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4535">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4536">函数Func_french_drivers_license查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4536">the function Func_french_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4537">找到Keyword_french_drivers_license关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4537">a keyword from Keyword_french_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="18e55a36-a01b-4b0f-943d-dc10282a1824" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_french_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4664">法国健康保险号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4664">France health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4665">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4665">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4666">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4666">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4667">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4667">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4668">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4668">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4669">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4669">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4670">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4670">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4671">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4671">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4672">21 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4672">21-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4673">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4673">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4674">21 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4674">21-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4675">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4675">10 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4676">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4676">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4677">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4677">10 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4678">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4678">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4679">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4679">a digit</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4680">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4680">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4681">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4681">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4682">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4682">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4683">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4683">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4684">正则表达式Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4684">the regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4685">找到来自Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4685">a keyword from Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="9bc2069e-76df-4ff9-ac02-2f519469e236" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4686">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4686">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_france_health_insurance_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4687">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4687">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4688">insurance card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4688">insurance card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4689">carte vitale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4689">carte vitale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4690">carte d'assuré social</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4690">carte d'assuré social</span></span>


## <a name="france-national-id-card-cni"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4691">法国国家/ (CNI) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4691">France national id card (CNI)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4692">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4692">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4693">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4693">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4694">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4694">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4695">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4695">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4696">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4696">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4697">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4697">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4698">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4698">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4699">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4699">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4700">正则表达式 Regex_france_cni 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4700">The regular expression Regex_france_cni finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4701">找到来自Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4701">A keyword from Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France CNI -->
    <Entity id="f741ac74-1bc0-4665-b69b-f0c7f927c0c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="65">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_france_cni" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_france_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4703">Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4703">Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4704">card number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4704">card number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4706">carte nationale d'idenite no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4706">carte nationale d'idenite no</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4710">national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4710">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4711">national identity</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4711">national identity</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4712">nationalidno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4712">nationalidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4713">numéro d'assurance mal一e</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4713">numéro d'assurance maladie</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4714">numéro de carte vitale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4714">numéro de carte vitale</span></span>


## <a name="france-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4715">法国护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4715">France passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4716">此实体在欧盟护照号码敏感信息类型中可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4716">This entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4717">它还作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4717">It's also available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4718">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4718">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4719">九个数字和字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4719">nine digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4720">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4720">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4721">九个数字和字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4721">nine digits and letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4722">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4722">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4723">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4723">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4724">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4724">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4725">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4725">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4726">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4726">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4727">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4727">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4728">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4728">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4729">函数 `Func_fr_passport` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4729">The function `Func_fr_passport` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4730">找到 或 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4730">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4731">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date3` 格式为 DD MM YYYY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4731">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4732">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4732">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4733">函数 `Func_fr_passport` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4733">The function `Func_fr_passport` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4734">找到 或 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4734">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- France Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="3008b884-8c8c-4cd8-a289-99f34fc7ff5d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4735">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4735">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4736">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4736">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4742">passport no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4742">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4743">passportnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4743">passportnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4744">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4744">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4745">passportnumbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4745">passportnumbers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4746">passport numbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4746">passport numbers</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_france_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4747">Keywords_france_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4747">Keywords_france_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4748">numéro de passeport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4748">numéro de passeport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4749">passeport n °</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4749">passeport n °</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4750">passeport non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4750">passeport non</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4751">passeport#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4751">passeport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4752">passeport#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4752">passeport#</span></span>

## <a name="france-social-security-number-insee"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4765">法国社会保险号码 (INSEE) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4765">France social security number (INSEE)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4766">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4766">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4767">15 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4767">15 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4768">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4768">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4769">必须匹配两种模式之一：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4769">Must match one of two patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4770">13 个数字，后跟一个空格，后跟两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4770">13 digits followed by a space followed by two digits</span></span><br/>
<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4771">或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4771">or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4772">15 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4772">15 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4773">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4773">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4774">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4774">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4775">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4775">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4776">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4776">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4777">函数 `Func_french_insee` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4777">The function `Func_french_insee` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4778">找到 Keyword_fr_insee 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4778">A keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4779">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4779">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4780">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4780">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4781">函数Func_french_insee或Func_fr_insee找到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4781">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4782">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4782">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France INSEE -->
    <Entity id="71f62b97-efe0-4aa1-aa49-e14de253619d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

no. d'identité</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-p133">no. d'identité</span></span>

no. d'identite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-p134">no. d'identite</span></span>
