## <a name="france-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4813">法国税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4813">France tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4814">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4814">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4815">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4815">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4816">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4816">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4817">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4817">13 digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4818">一个数字，必须为 0、1、2 或 3</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4818">One digit that must be 0, 1, 2, or 3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4819">一位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4819">One digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4820">一个空格（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4820">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4821">两位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4821">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4822">一个空格（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4822">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4823">三个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4823">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4824">一个空格（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4824">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4825">三个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4825">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4826">一个空格（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4826">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4827">三个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4827">Three check digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4828">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4828">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4829">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4829">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4830">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4830">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4831">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4831">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4832">函数  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4832">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4833">找到 的  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4833">A keyword from  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4834">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4834">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4835">函数  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4835">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Tax Identification Number (numéro SPI.) -->
      <Entity id="ed59e77e-171d-442c-9ec1-88e2ebcb5b0a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

#### <a name="keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4837">Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4837">Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4838">numéro d'identification fiscale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4838">numéro d'identification fiscale</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4840">tax identification no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4840">tax identification no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4841">tax identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4841">tax identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4842">tax no#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4842">tax no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4843">tax no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4843">tax no</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4846">已#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4846">taxid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4847">一些#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4847">taxidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4848">一些#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4848">taxidnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4849">taxno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4849">taxno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4850">taxnumber#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4850">taxnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4851">taxnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4851">taxnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4852">tin id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4852">tin id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4853">tin no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4853">tin no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4854">tin#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4854">tin#</span></span>


## <a name="france-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4855">法国增值税编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4855">France value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4856">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4856">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4857">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4857">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4858">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4858">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4859">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4859">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4860">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4860">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4861">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4861">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4862">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4862">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4863">13 个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4863">13 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4864">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4864">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4865">13 个字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4865">13 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4866">两个字母 - FR (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4866">two letters  - FR (case insensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4867">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4867">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4868">两个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4868">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4869">可选空格、点、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4869">an optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4870">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4870">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4871">可选空格、点、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4871">an optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4872">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4872">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4873">可选空格、点、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4873">an optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4874">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4874">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4875">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4875">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4876">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4876">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4877">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4877">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4878">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4878">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4879">函数Func_france_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4879">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4880">找到来自Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4880">A keyword from Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4881">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4881">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4882">函数Func_france_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4882">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="949121e6-ad9f-4379-8731-710342baea78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4883">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4883">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4885">vat number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4885">vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4886">vat no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4886">vat no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4887">vat#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4887">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4888">增值税</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4888">value added tax</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4889">siren identification no numéro d'identification taxe surur ajoutée</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4889">siren identification no numéro d'identification taxe sur valeur ajoutée</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4890">taxeur ajoutée</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4890">taxe valeur ajoutée</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4891">taxe sur laurur ajoutée</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4891">taxe sur la valeur ajoutée</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4892">n° tva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4892">n° tva</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4893">numéro de tva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4893">numéro de tva</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4894">numéro d'identification siren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4894">numéro d'identification siren</span></span>


## <a name="germany-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4895">德国驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4895">Germany driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4896">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟驾驶证号码敏感信息类型中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4896">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4897">它还作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4897">It's also available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4898">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4898">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4899">11 个数字和字母的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4899">combination of 11 digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4900">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4900">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4901">11 个数字和字母 (不区分) 大小写：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4901">11 digits and letters (not case-sensitive):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4902">数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4902">a digit or letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4903">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4903">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4904">六个数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4904">six digits or letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4905">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4905">a digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4906">数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4906">a digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4907">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4907">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4908">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4908">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4909">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4909">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4910">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4910">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4911">函数 Func_german_drivers_license 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4911">The function Func_german_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4912">找到 Keyword_german_drivers_license_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4912">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-4913">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-4913">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="91da9335-1edb-45b7-a95f-5fe41a16c63c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5062">德国身份证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5062">Germany identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5063">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5063">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5064">自 2010 年 11 月 1 日起：九个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5064">since 1 November 2010: Nine letters and digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5065">从 1987 年 4 月 1 日到 2010 年 10 月 31 日：10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5065">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010: 10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5066">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5066">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5067">自 2010 年 11 月 1 日起：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5067">since 1 November 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5068">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5068">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5069">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5069">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5070">从 1987 年 4 月 1 日到 2010 年 10 月 31 日：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5070">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5071">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5071">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5072">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5072">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5073">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5073">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5074">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5074">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5075">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5075">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5076">正则表达式 Regex_germany_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5076">The regular expression Regex_germany_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5077">找到 Keyword_germany_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5077">A keyword from Keyword_germany_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="e577372f-c42e-47a0-9d85-bebed1c237d4" recommendedConfidence="65" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_germany_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_germany_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5078">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5078">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5080">aus一s</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5080">ausweis</span></span>

## <a name="germany-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5093">德国护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5093">Germany passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5094">此实体包含在欧盟护照号码敏感信息类型中，并作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5094">This entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5095">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5095">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5096">10 个数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5096">10 digits or letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5097">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5097">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5098">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5098">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5099">第一个字符是此集合中的数字或字母 (C、F、G、H、J、K) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5099">first character is a digit or a letter from this set (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5100">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5100">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5101">此集合中的五个数字或字母 (C、-H、J-N、P、R、T、V-Z) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5101">five digits or letters from this set (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5102">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5102">a digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5103">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5103">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5104">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5104">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5105">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5105">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5106">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5106">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5107">函数 Func_german_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5107">The function Func_german_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5108">找到 或 `Keyword_german_passport` `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5108">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` or `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5109">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5109">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5110">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5110">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5111">函数 Func_german_passport_data 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5111">The function Func_german_passport_data finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5112">找到 或 `Keyword_german_passport` `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5112">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` or `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5113">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5113">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="2e3da144-d42b-47ed-b123-fbf78604e52c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport_data" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5136">德国税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5136">Germany tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5137">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5137">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5138">11 个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5138">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5139">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5139">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5140">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5140">11 digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5141">两位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5141">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5142">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5142">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5143">三位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5143">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5144">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5144">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5145">三位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5145">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5146">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5146">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5147">两位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5147">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5148">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5148">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5149">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5149">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5150">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5150">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5151">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5151">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5152">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5152">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5153">函数  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5153">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5154">找到 的  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5154">A keyword from  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5155">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5155">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5156">函数  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5156">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Germany Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="43316a89-9880-40cf-b980-04bc7eefcec5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5173">taxno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5173">taxno#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5177">tin no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5177">tin no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5178">tin#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5178">tin#</span></span>

## <a name="germany-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5182">德国增值税编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5182">Germany value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5183">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5183">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5184">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5184">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5185">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5185">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5186">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5186">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5187">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5187">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5188">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5188">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5189">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5189">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5190">11 个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5190">11 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5191">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5191">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5192">11 字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5192">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5193">字母 D 或 d</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5193">a letter D or d</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5194">字母 E 或 e</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5194">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5195">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5195">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5196">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5196">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5197">可选空格或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5197">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5198">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5198">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5199">可选空格或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5199">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5200">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5200">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5201">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5201">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5202">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5202">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5203">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5203">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5204">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5204">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5205">函数Func_germany_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5205">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5206">找到来自Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5206">A keyword from Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5207">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5207">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5208">函数Func_germany_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5208">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Germany Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="db177eb2-8811-4842-bffc-128c14aa219f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5213">vat#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5213">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5214">vat# mehrwertsteuer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5214">vat#  mehrwertsteuer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5215">mwst</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5215">mwst</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5217">mehrwertsteuer nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5217">mehrwertsteuer nummer</span></span>


## <a name="greece-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5218">希腊驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5218">Greece driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5219">此实体包含在欧盟驾驶证号码敏感信息类型中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5219">This entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5220">它还作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5220">It is also available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5221">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5221">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5222">九个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5222">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5223">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5223">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5224">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5224">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5225">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5225">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5226">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5226">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5227">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5227">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5228">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5228">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5229">正则表达式查找  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5229">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5230">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5230">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Greece Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="7a2200b5-aacf-4e3c-ab36-136d3e68b7da" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-national-id-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5356">希腊国民身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5356">Greece national ID card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5357">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5357">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5358">7-8 个字母和数字组合加一个短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5358">Combination of 7-8 letters and numbers plus a dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5359">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5359">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5360">七个字母和数字（旧格式）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5360">Seven letters and numbers (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5361">一个字母（希腊字母表中的任一字母） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5361">One letter (any letter of the Greek alphabet)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5362">一个短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5362">A dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5363">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5363">Six digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5364">八个字母和数字（新格式）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5364">Eight letters and numbers (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5365">大写字符同时出现在希腊和拉丁字母表中的两个字母 (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5365">Two letters whose uppercase character occurs in both the Greek and Latin alphabets (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5366">一个短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5366">A dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5367">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5367">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5368">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5368">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5369">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5369">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5370">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5370">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5371">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5371">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5372">正则表达式 Regex_greece_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5372">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5373">找到 Keyword_greece_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5373">A keyword from Keyword_greece_id_card is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5374">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5374">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5375">正则表达式 Regex_greece_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5375">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Greece National ID Card -->
      <Entity id="82568215-1da1-46d3-874a-d2294d81b5ac" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5376">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5376">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_greece_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5377">Keyword_greece_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5377">Keyword_greece_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5378">greek id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5378">greek id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5379">希腊语国家/区 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5379">greek national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5380">希腊语个人 ID 卡</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5380">greek personal id card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5381">希腊语政府 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5381">greek police id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5382">identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5382">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5383">tautotita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5383">tautotita</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5384">ταυτότητα</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5384">ταυτότητα</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5385">ταυτότητας</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5385">ταυτότητας</span></span>


## <a name="greece-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5386">希腊护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5386">Greece passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5387">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5387">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5388">两个字母后跟七个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5388">Two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5389">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5389">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5390">两个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5390">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5391">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5391">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5392">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5392">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5393">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5393">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5394">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5394">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5395">正则表达式查找  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5395">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5396">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5396">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5397">正则表达式查找 `Regex_greece_eu_passport_date` DD MMM YY 格式的日期 (示例 - 8 月 19) 找到关键字 `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date`</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5397">The regular expression `Regex_greece_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM YY (Example - 28 Aug 19) or a keyword from `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5398">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5398">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5399">正则表达式查找  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5399">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5400">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5400">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Greece Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7e65eb47-cdf9-4f52-8f90-2a27d5ee67e3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5401">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5401">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5405">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5405">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5406">passports</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5406">passports</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5410">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5410">passport number</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_greece_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5413">Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5413">Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5414">αριθμός διαβατηρίου</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5414">αριθμός διαβατηρίου</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5415">αριθμούς διαβατηρίου</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5415">αριθμούς διαβατηρίου</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5416">αριθμός διαβατηριο</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5416">αριθμός διαβατηριο</span></span>


## <a name="greece-social-security-number-amka"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5417">希腊社会保险号码 (AMKA) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5417">Greece Social Security Number (AMKA)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5418">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5418">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5419">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5419">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5420">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5420">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5421">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5421">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5422">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5422">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5423">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5423">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5424">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5424">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5425">11 个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5425">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5426">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5426">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5427">六个数字作为出生日期 YYMMDD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5427">Six digits as date of birth YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5428">四位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5428">Four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5429">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5429">a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5430">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5430">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5431">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5431">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5432">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5432">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5433">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5433">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5434">函数  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5434">The function  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5435">找到 的  `Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5435">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5436">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5436">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5437">函数  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5437">The function  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Greece Social Security Number (AMKA) -->
      <Entity id="e39b03f4-50ea-41ae-af7a-a4b9539596ad" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_greece_eu_ssn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_greece_eu_ssn" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5438">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5438">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5439">Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5439">Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5440">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5440">ssn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5441">ssn#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5441">ssn#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5442">social security no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5442">social security no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5443">socialsecurityno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5443">socialsecurityno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5444">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5444">social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5445">amka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5445">amka</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5446">a.m.k.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5446">a.m.k.a.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5447">Αριθμού Μητρώου Κοινωνικής Ασφάλισης</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5447">Αριθμού Μητρώου Κοινωνικής Ασφάλισης</span></span>


## <a name="greece-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5448">希腊税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5448">Greece tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5449">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5449">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5450">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5450">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5451">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5451">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5452">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5452">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5453">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5453">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5454">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5454">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5455">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5455">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5456">九个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5456">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5457">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5457">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5458">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5458">Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5459">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5459">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5460">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5460">Not applicable</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5461">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5461">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5462">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5462">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5463">正则表达式查找  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5463">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5464">找到 的  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5464">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Greek Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="15a54a5a-53d4-4080-ad43-a2a4fe1d3bf7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hong-kong-identity-card-hkid-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5493">Hk Kong identity card (HKID) number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5493">Hong Kong identity card (HKID) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5494">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5494">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5495">8-9 个字母和数字组合，最后一个字符两边可选择加括号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5495">Combination of 8-9 letters and numbers plus optional parentheses around the final character</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5496">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5496">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5497">8-9 个字母组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5497">Combination of 8-9 letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5498">1-2 个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5498">1-2 letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5499">六个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5499">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5500">最后一个字符（任意数字或字母 A）是校验位，两边可以选择加括号。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5500">The final character (any digit or the letter A), which is the check digit and is optionally enclosed in parentheses.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5501">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5501">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5502">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5502">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5503">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5503">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5504">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5504">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5505">函数 Func_hong_kong_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5505">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5506">找到 Keyword_hong_kong_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5506">A keyword from Keyword_hong_kong_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5507">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5507">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5508">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5508">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5509">函数 Func_hong_kong_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5509">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5510">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5510">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Hong Kong Identity Card (HKID) number -->
<Entity id="e63c28a7-ad29-4c17-a41a-3d2a0b70fd9c" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5511">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5511">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_hong_kong_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5512">Keyword_hong_kong_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5512">Keyword_hong_kong_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5513">hkid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5513">hkid</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5515">HKIDC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5515">HKIDC</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5517">identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5517">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5518">hk identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5518">hk identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5519">hong kong id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5519">hong kong id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5520">香港身份證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5520">香港身份證</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5521">香港永久性居民身份證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5521">香港永久性居民身份證</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5522">身份證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5522">身份證</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5523">身份証</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5523">身份証</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5550">匈牙利驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5550">Hungary driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5551">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5551">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5552">两个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5552">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5553">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5553">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5554">两个字母和六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5554">Two letters and six digits:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5555">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5555">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5556">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5556">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5557">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5557">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5558">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5558">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5559">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5559">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5560">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5560">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5561">正则表达式查找  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5561">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5562">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5562">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <Entity id="9d31c46b-6e6b-444c-aeb1-6dd7e604bb24" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5687">匈牙利个人标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5687">Hungary personal identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5688">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5688">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5689">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5689">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5690">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5690">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5691">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5691">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5692">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5692">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5693">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5693">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5694">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5694">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5695">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5695">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5696">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5696">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5697">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5697">11 digits:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5698">一个数字，对应性别，1 表示男性，2 表示男性。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5698">One digit that corresponds to gender, 1 for male, 2 for female.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5699">对于在 1900 以前生活的人或具有双重公民权的人，也可以申请其他号码。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5699">Other numbers are also possible for citizens born before 1900 or citizens with double citizenship.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5700">六个数字，对应于出生日期 (YYMMDD) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5700">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5701">对应于序列号的三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5701">Three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5702">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5702">One check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5703">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5703">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5704">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5704">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5705">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5705">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5706">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5706">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5707">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5707">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5708">找到 的  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5708">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5709">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5709">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5710">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5710">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Hungary Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="7b5cc218-7046-47d9-80c9-f325b50896ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5711">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5711">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5712">Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5712">Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5713">id number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5713">id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5714">identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5714">identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5715">sz ig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5715">sz ig</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5716">sz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5716">sz.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5717">ig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5717">ig.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5718">sz.ig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5718">sz.ig.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5719">személyazonosító igazolv一y</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5719">személyazonosító igazolvány</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5720">személyi igazolvméy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5720">személyi igazolvány</span></span>


## <a name="hungary-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5721">匈牙利护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5721">Hungary passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5722">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5722">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5723">两个字母后跟 6 个或 7 个数字，没有空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5723">Two letters followed by six or seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5724">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5724">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5725">两个字母后跟六个或七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5725">Two letters followed by six or seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5726">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5726">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5727">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5727">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5728">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5728">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5729">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5729">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5730">正则表达式查找  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5730">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5731">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5731">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5732">正则表达式查找 `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YY 格式的日期 (示例 - 01 MÁR/MAR 12) 找到的 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5732">The regular expression `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format  DD MMM/MMM YY (Example - 01 MÁR/MAR 12) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5733">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5733">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5734">正则表达式查找  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5734">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5735">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5735">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Hungary Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="5b483910-9aa7-4c99-9917-f4001464bda7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5736">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5736">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5737">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5737">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5738">passport#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5738">passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5739">passport#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5739">passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5740">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5740">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5741">passports</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5741">passports</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5742">passportno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5742">passportno</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5743">passport no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5743">passport no</span></span>
