## <a name="hungary-social-security-number-taj"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5755">匈牙利社会保险号码 (TAJ) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5755">Hungary social security number (TAJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5756">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5756">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5757">九个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5757">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5758">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5758">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5759">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5759">Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5760">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5760">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5761">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5761">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5762">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5762">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5763">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5763">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5764">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5764">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5765">找到 的  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5765">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5766">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5766">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5767">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5767">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Social Security Number (TAJ) -->
      <Entity id="0de78315-9537-47f5-95ab-b3e77eba3993" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5787">匈牙利税收标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5787">Hungary tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5788">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5788">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5789">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5789">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5790">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5790">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5791">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5791">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5792">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5792">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5793">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5793">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5794">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5794">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5795">10 个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5795">10 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5796">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5796">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5797">10 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5797">10 digits:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5798">一个数字必须为"8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5798">One digit that must be "8"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5799">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5799">Eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5800">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5800">One check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5801">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5801">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5802">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5802">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5803">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5803">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5804">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5804">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5805">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5805">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5806">找到 的  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5806">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5807">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5807">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5808">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5808">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Hungary Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="ede42eb4-59d9-49eb-9603-d7853fbda91d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5811">adóazonosító szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5811">adóazonosító szám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5812">adóhatóság szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5812">adóhatóság szám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5813">adószám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5813">adószám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5814">匈牙利语（该文）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5814">hungarian tin</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5817">tax id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5817">tax id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5818">tax identification no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5818">tax identification no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5819">tax identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5819">tax identification number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5823">tax registration number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5823">tax registration number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5827">taxno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5827">taxno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5828">taxnumber#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5828">taxnumber#</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5834">匈牙利增值税编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5834">Hungary value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5835">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5835">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5836">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5836">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5837">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5837">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5838">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5838">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5839">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5839">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5840">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5840">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5841">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5841">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5842">10 个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5842">10 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5843">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5843">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5844">10 个字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5844">10 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5845">两个字母 - HU 或 hu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5845">two letters - HU or hu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5846">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5846">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5847">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5847">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5848">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5848">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5849">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5849">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5850">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5850">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5851">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5851">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5852">函数Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5852">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5853">找到来自Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5853">A keyword from Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5854">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5854">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5855">函数Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5855">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="976349a0-683b-477a-90f8-ff0a220d5592" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5856">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5856">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_hungary_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5857">Keyword_Hungary_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5857">Keyword_Hungary_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5858">vat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5858">vat</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5859">增值税编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5859">value added tax number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5860">vat#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5860">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5861">vatno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5861">vatno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5862">hungarianvatno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5862">hungarianvatno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5863">tax no.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5863">tax no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5864">value added tax áfa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5864">value added tax áfa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5865">kázósségi adószám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5865">közösségi adószám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5866">által一os forgalmi adó szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5866">általános forgalmi adó szám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5867">hozzáadott一ték adó</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5867">hozzáadottérték adó</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5868">áfa szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5868">áfa szám</span></span>


## <a name="india-permanent-account-number-pan"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5869">PAN (印度永久) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5869">India permanent account number (PAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5870">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5870">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5871">10 个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5871">10 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5872">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5872">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5873">10 个字母或数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5873">10 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5874">三个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5874">Three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5875">C、P、H、F、A、T、B、L、J、G (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5875">A letter in C, P, H, F, A, T, B, L, J, G (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5876">一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5876">A letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5877">四位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5877">Four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5878">字母是字母检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5878">A letter that is an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5879">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5879">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5880">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5880">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5881">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5881">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5882">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5882">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5883">正则表达式 Regex_india_permanent_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5883">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5884">找到 Keyword_india_permanent_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5884">A keyword from Keyword_india_permanent_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5885">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5885">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5886">正则表达式 Regex_india_permanent_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5886">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
      <!-- India Permanent Account Number -->
      <Entity id="2602bfee-9bb0-47a5-a7a6-2bf3053e2804" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_india_permanent_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3520.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5887">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5887">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_india_permanent_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5888">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5888">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5889">Permanent Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5889">Permanent Account Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5890">PAN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5890">PAN</span></span>

## <a name="india-unique-identification-aadhaar-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5891">印度唯一 (Aadhaar) 号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5891">India unique identification (Aadhaar) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5892">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5892">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5893">12 个数字（包含可选空格或短划线）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5893">12 digits containing optional spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5894">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5894">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5895">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5895">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5896">不为 0 或 1 的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5896">A digit which is not 0 or 1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5897">三位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5897">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5898">一个可选空格或短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5898">An optional space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5899">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5899">Four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5900">一个可选空格或短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5900">An optional space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5901">最后一个数字，即检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5901">The final digit, which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5902">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5902">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5903">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5903">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5904">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5904">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5905">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5905">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5906">函数 Func_india_aadhaar 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5906">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5907">找到 Keyword_india_aadhar 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5907">A keyword from Keyword_india_aadhar is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5908">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5908">The checksum passes.</span></span>
-
<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5909">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5909">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5910">函数 Func_india_aadhaar 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5910">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5911">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5911">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Unique Identification (Aadhaar) number -->
<Entity id="1ca46b29-76f5-4f46-9383-cfa15e91048f" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_aadhar"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5912">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5912">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_india_aadhar"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5913">Keyword_india_aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5913">Keyword_india_aadhar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5914">aadhaar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5914">aadhaar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5915">aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5915">aadhar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5916">aadhar#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5916">aadhar#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5917">uid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5917">uid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5918">आधार</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5918">आधार</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5919">uidai</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5919">uidai</span></span>

## <a name="indonesia-identity-card-ktp-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5920">印度尼西亚身份证号码 (KTP) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5920">Indonesia identity card (KTP) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5921">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5921">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5922">16 个数字（包含可选点）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5922">16 digits containing optional periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5923">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5923">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5924">16 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5924">16 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5925">两位省代码 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5925">Two-digit province code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5926">一个点（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5926">A period (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5927">两位摄政统治区或城市代码 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5927">Two-digit regency or city code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5928">两位住宅小区代码 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5928">Two-digit subdistrict code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5929">一个点（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5929">A period (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5930">六个数字，格式为 DDMMYY，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5930">Six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5931">一个点（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5931">A period (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5932">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5932">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5933">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5933">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5934">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5934">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5935">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5935">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5936">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5936">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5937">正则表达式 Regex_indonesia_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5937">The regular expression Regex_indonesia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5938">找到 Keyword_indonesia_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5938">A keyword from Keyword_indonesia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Indonesia Identity Card (KTP) Number -->
<Entity id="da68fdb0-f383-4981-8c86-82689d3b7d55" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_indonesia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_indonesia_id_card"/>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5939">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5939">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_indonesia_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5940">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5940">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5941">KTP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5941">KTP</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5942">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5942">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5943">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5943">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span></span>

## <a name="international-banking-account-number-iban"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5944">国际银行帐号 (IBAN) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5944">International banking account number (IBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5945">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5945">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5946">国家/地区代码（两个字母）加校验位（两个数字）以及 bban 号码（最多 30 个字符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5946">Country code (two letters) plus check digits (two digits) plus bban number (up to 30 characters)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5947">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5947">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5948">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5948">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5949">两个字母的国家/地区代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5949">Two-letter country code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5950">两个校验位（后跟一个可选空间） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5950">Two check digits (followed by an optional space)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5951">1-7 个包含 4 个字母或数字的组（可以使用空格进行分隔）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5951">1-7 groups of four letters or digits (can be separated by spaces)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5952">1-3 个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5952">1-3 letters or digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-p139">每个国家/地区的格式稍有不同。IBAN 敏感信息类型涵盖这 60 个国家/地区：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-p139">The format for each country is slightly different. The IBAN sensitive information type covers these 60 countries:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5955">ad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5955">ad</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5956">ae</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5956">ae</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5957">al</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5957">al</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5964">ch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5964">ch</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5965">cr</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5965">cr</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5978">gi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5978">gi</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5979">gl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5979">gl</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5980">gr</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5980">gr</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5982">hu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5982">hu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5983">ie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5983">ie</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5984">il</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5984">il</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5985">is</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5985">is</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5986">it</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5986">it</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5987">kw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5987">kw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5988">kz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5988">kz</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5989">lb</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5989">lb</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5990">li</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5990">li</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5991">lt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5991">lt</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5992">lu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5992">lu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5993">lv</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5993">lv</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5994">mc</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5994">mc</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5995">md</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5995">md</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5996">me</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5996">me</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5997">mk</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5997">mk</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-5998">mr</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-5998">mr</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6000">mu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6000">mu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6001">nl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6001">nl</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6004">pt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6004">pt</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6005">ro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6005">ro</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6007">sa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6007">sa</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6015">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6015">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6016">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6016">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6017">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6017">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6018">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6018">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6019">函数 Func_iban 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6019">The function Func_iban finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6020">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6020">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="e7dc4711-11b7-4cb0-b88b-2c394a771f0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_iban" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6021">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6021">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6022">无</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6022">None</span></span>


## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-10-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6023">ICD-10-CM (国际) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6023">International classification of diseases (ICD-10-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6024">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6024">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6025">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6025">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6026">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6026">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6027">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6027">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6028">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6028">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6029">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6029">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6030">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6030">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6031">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6031">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6032">找到来自Dictionary_icd_10_updated关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6032">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6033">找到来自Dictionary_icd_10_codes关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6033">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6034">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6034">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6035">找到更新Dictionary_icd_10_关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6035">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_ updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- ICD-10 CM -->
      <Entity id="3356946c-6bb7-449b-b253-6ffa419c0ce7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
        </Pattern>

```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6036">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6036">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6037">基于国际Dictionary_icd_10_updated分类、第十次修订、修订修改 ([ICD-10-CM ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)) 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6037">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6038">此类型仅查找术语，而不是保险代码。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6038">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6039">基于国际Dictionary_icd_10_codes分类、第十次修订、修订修改 ([ICD-10-CM ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)) 关键字词典的任何术语。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6039">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6040">此类型仅查找保险代码，而不是说明。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6040">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-9-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6041">ICD-9-CM (国际) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6041">International classification of diseases (ICD-9-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6042">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6042">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6043">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6043">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6044">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6044">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6045">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6045">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6046">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6046">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6047">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6047">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6048">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6048">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6049">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6049">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6050">找到来自Dictionary_icd_9_updated关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6050">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6051">找到来自Dictionary_icd_9_codes关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6051">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6052">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6052">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6053">找到来自Dictionary_icd_9_updated关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6053">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <Entity id="fa3f9c74-ee07-4c52-b5f2-085d6b2c0ec4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6054">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6054">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6055">基于国际Dictionary_icd_9_updated分类、第九次修订、修订修改和 [ICD-9-CM ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605) (关键字词典) 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6055">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6056">此类型仅查找术语，而不是保险代码。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6056">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6057">基于国际Dictionary_icd_9_codes分类、第九次修订、修订和 [ICD-9-CM ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605) (的关键字词典中的) 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6057">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6058">此类型仅查找保险代码，而不是说明。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6058">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="ip-address"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6059">IP 地址</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6059">IP address</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6060">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6060">Format</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv4"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6061">IPv4：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6061">IPv4:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6062">处理 IPv4 地址 (格式) 和无格式 (IPv4) 句点的复杂模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6062">Complex pattern that accounts for formatted (periods) and unformatted (no periods) versions of the IPv4 addresses</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv6"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6063">IPv6：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6063">IPv6:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6064">包含带格式的 IPv6 号码的复杂 (包括冒号) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6064">Complex pattern that accounts for formatted IPv6 numbers (which include colons)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6065">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6065">Pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6066">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6066">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6067">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6067">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6068">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6068">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6069">对于 IPv6，如果在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6069">For IPv6, a DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6070">正则表达式 Regex_ipv6_address 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6070">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6071">未找到 Keyword_ipaddress 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6071">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6072">对于 IPv4，如果在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6072">For IPv4, a DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6073">正则表达式 Regex_ipv4_address 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6073">The regular expression Regex_ipv4_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6074">找到 Keyword_ipaddress 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6074">A keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6075">对于 IPv6，如果在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6075">For IPv6, a DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6076">正则表达式 Regex_ipv6_address 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6076">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6077">未找到 Keyword_ipaddress 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6077">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- IP Address -->
    <Entity id="1daa4ad5-e2dd-4ca4-a788-54722c09efb2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv4_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6078">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6078">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ipaddress"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6079">Keyword_ipaddress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6079">Keyword_ipaddress</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6080">此 (的 IP 关键字区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6080">IP (this keyword is case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6081">ip address</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6081">ip address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6082">ip addresses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6082">ip addresses</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6083">internet protocol</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6083">internet protocol</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6084">IP-כתובת ה</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6084">IP-כתובת ה</span></span>

## <a name="ireland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6085">爱尔兰驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6085">Ireland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6086">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6086">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6087">六个数字后跟四个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6087">Six digits followed by four letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6088">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6088">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6089">六个数字和四个字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6089">Six digits and four letters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6090">六位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6090">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6091">四个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6091">Four letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6092">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6092">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6093">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6093">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6094">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6094">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6095">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6095">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6096">正则表达式查找  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6096">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6097">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6097">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ireland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="e01bccd9-eb4d-414f-ace1-e9b6a4c4a2ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6221">爱尔兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6221">Ireland passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6222">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6222">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6223">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6223">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6224">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6224">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6225">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6225">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6226">两个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6226">Two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6227">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6227">Seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6228">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6228">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6229">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6229">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6230">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6230">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6231">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6231">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6232">正则表达式查找  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6232">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6233">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6233">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6234">正则表达式查找格式为 `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YYYYY (Example - 01 BEA/MAY 1988) 或找到的 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 关键字的日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6234">The regular expression `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 01 BEA/MAY 1988) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6235">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6235">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6236">正则表达式查找  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6236">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6237">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6237">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ireland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="a2130f27-9ee2-4103-84f9-a6b1ee7d0cbf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-personal-public-service-pps-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6261">爱尔兰个人公共服务 (PPS) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6261">Ireland personal public service (PPS) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6262">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6262">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6263">2012 (2012 年 12 月 31) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6263">Old format (until 31 December 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6264">七个数字后跟 1-2 个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6264">seven digits followed by 1-2 letters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6265">2013 (1 月 1 日及之后的新) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6265">New format (1 January 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6266">七个数字后跟两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6266">seven digits followed by two letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6267">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6267">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6268">2012 (2012 年 12 月 31) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6268">Old format (until 31 December 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6269">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6269">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6270">一到两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6270">one to two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6271">2013 (1 月 1 日及之后的新) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6271">New format (1 January 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6272">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6272">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6273">字母 (不区分大小写) 字母检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6273">a letter (not case-sensitive) which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6274">A-I 或"W"范围中的可选字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6274">An optional letter in the range A-I, or “W”</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6275">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6275">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6276">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6276">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6277">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6277">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6278">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6278">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6279">函数 Func_ireland_pps 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6279">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6280">找到来自Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6280">A keyword from Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6281">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6281">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6282">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6282">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6283">函数 Func_ireland_pps 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6283">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6284">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6284">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ireland Personal Public Service (PPS) Number -->
      <Entity id="1cdb674d-c19a-4fcf-9f4b-7f56cc87345a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="israel-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6329">以色列银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6329">Israel bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6330">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6330">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6331">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6331">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6332">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6332">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6333">格式化：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6333">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6334">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6334">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6335">短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6335">a dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6336">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6336">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6337">短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6337">a dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6338">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6338">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6339">无格式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6339">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6340">	13 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6340">13 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6341">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6341">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6342">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6342">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6343">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6343">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6344">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6344">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6345">正则表达式 Regex_israel_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6345">The regular expression Regex_israel_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6346">找到 Keyword_israel_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6346">A keyword from Keyword_israel_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="7d08b2ff-a0b9-437f-957c-aeddbf9b2b25" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_israel_bank_account_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_israel_bank_account_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6347">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6347">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_bank_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6348">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6348">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6349">Bank Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6349">Bank Account Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6350">Bank Account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6350">Bank Account</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6351">Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6351">Account Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6352">מספר חשבון בנק</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6352">מספר חשבון בנק</span></span>

## <a name="israel-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6353">以色列国家标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6353">Israel national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6354">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6354">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6355">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6355">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6356">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6356">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6357">九个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6357">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6358">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6358">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6359">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6359">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6360">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6360">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6361">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6361">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6362">函数 Func_israeli_national_id_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6362">The function Func_israeli_national_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6363">找到 Keyword_Israel_National_ID 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6363">A keyword from Keyword_Israel_National_ID is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6364">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6364">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel National ID Number -->
<Entity id="e05881f5-1db1-418c-89aa-a3ac5c5277ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_israeli_national_id_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Israel_National_ID" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6365">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6365">Keywords</span></span>

-   <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6368">מספר זיה וי</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6368">מספר זיה וי</span></span>

-   <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6370">זהותישר אלית</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6370">זהותישר אלית</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6371">هو ية اسرائيل ية عدد</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6371">هو ية اسرائيل ية عدد</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6372">هوية إسرائ يلية</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6372">هوية إسرائ يلية</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6373">رقم الهوية</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6373">رقم الهوية</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6374">عدد هوية فريدة من نوعها</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6374">عدد هوية فريدة من نوعها</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6375">idnumber#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6375">idnumber#</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6376">id number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6376">id number</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6377">identity no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6377">identity no</span></span>        
-   <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6378">identitynumber#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6378">identitynumber#</span></span>

## <a name="italy-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6383">意大利驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6383">Italy driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6384">此类型实体包含在欧盟驾驶证号码敏感信息类型中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6384">This type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6385">它还作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6385">It is also available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6386">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6386">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6387">10 个字母和数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6387">a combination of 10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6388">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6388">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6389">10 个字母和数字的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6389">a combination of 10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6390">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6390">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6391">字母"A"或"V" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6391">the letter "A" or "V" (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6392">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6392">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6393">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6393">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6394">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6394">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6395">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6395">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6396">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6396">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6397">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6397">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6398">正则表达式查找 `Regex_italy_drivers_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6398">The regular expression `Regex_italy_drivers_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6399">找到 或 `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6399">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Italy Driver's license Number -->
    <Entity id="97d6244f-9157-41bd-8e0c-9d669a5c4d71" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_drivers_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-fiscal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6526">意大利财政代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6526">Italy fiscal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6527">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6527">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6528">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6528">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6529">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6529">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6530">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6530">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6531">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6531">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6532">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6532">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6533">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6533">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6534">指定模式中字母和数字的 16 个字符组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6534">a 16-character combination of letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6535">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6535">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6536">字母和数字的 16 个字符组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6536">A 16-character combination of letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6537">三个字母，对应于系列名称中的前三个辅音</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6537">three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6538">三个字母，分别对应名字中的第一个、第三个和第四个辅音</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6538">three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6539">两个数字，对应于出生日期的最后一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6539">two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6540">一个对应于出生日期月份字母的字母 - 字母按字母顺序使用，但只有字母 A 到 E、H、L、M、P、R 到 T (因此，January 为 A，10 月为 R) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6540">one letter that corresponds to the letter for the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (so, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6541">为区分性别，与当月中的一天对应的两个数字，40 个数字将添加到女士的出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6541">two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth in order to differentiate between genders, 40 is added to the day of birth for women</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6542">四个数字，对应于特定的地区代码，该人的 (国家/地区代码用于国家/地区) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6542">four digits that correspond to the area code specific to the municipality where the person was born (country-wide codes are used for foreign countries)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6543">一个奇偶校验数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6543">one parity digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6544">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6544">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6545">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6545">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6546">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6546">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6547">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6547">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6548">函数  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6548">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6549">找到 的  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6549">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6550">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6550">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6551">函数  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6551">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Italy Fiscal Code -->
      <Entity id="4cd79172-8da9-4ff5-9188-98b1e7e2eca6" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
