## <a name="italy-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6586">意大利护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6586">Italy passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6587">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6587">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6588">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字（没有空格或分隔符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6588">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6589">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6589">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6590">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6590">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6591">两个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6591">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6592">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6592">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6593">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6593">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6594">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6594">not applicable</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6595">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6595">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6596">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6596">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6597">正则表达式查找  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6597">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6598">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6598">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6599">正则表达式查找格式为 `Regex_italy_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YYYYY (示例 - 01 GEN/JAN 1988) 或找到的 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6599">The regular expression `Regex_italy_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 01 GEN/JAN 1988) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6600">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6600">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6601">正则表达式查找  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6601">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6602">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6602">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Italy Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="39811019-4750-445f-b26d-4c0e6c431544" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6603">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6603">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="italy-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6626">意大利增值税编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6626">Italy value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6627">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6627">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6628">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6628">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6629">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6629">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6630">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6630">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6631">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6631">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6632">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6632">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6633">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6633">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6634">带可选分隔符的 13 个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6634">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6635">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6635">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6636">带可选分隔符的 13 个字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6636">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6637">I 或 i</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6637">I or i</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6638">T 或 t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6638">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6639">可选空格、点、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6639">optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6640">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6640">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6641">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6641">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6642">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6642">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6643">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6643">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6644">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6644">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6645">函数Func_italy_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6645">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6646">找到来自Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6646">A keyword from Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6647">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6647">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6648">函数Func_italy_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6648">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Italy Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="26a8cc07-2283-4a2a-ab1d-4ab643c4c67f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6650">Keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6650">Keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

## <a name="japan-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6656">日本银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6656">Japan bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6657">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6657">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6658">七个或八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6658">seven or eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6659">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6659">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6660">bank account number：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6660">bank account number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6661">七个或八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6661">seven or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6662">bank account branch code：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6662">bank account branch code:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6663">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6663">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6664">一个空格或 (划线) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6664">a space or dash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6665">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6665">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6666">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6666">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6667">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6667">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6668">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6668">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6669">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6669">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6670">函数 Func_jp_bank_account 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6670">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6671">找到 Keyword_jp_bank_account 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6671">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6672">下列其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6672">One of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6673">函数 Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6673">The function Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6674">找到 Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6674">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6675">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6675">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6676">函数 Func_jp_bank_account 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6676">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6677">找到 Keyword_jp_bank_account 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6677">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="d354f95b-96ee-4b80-80bc-4377312b55bc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Version minEngineVersion="15.01.0131.000">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
  </Version>
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6724">日本驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6724">Japan driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6725">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6725">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6726">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6726">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6727">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6727">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6728">12 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6728">12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6729">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6729">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6730">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6730">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6731">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6731">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6732">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6732">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6733">函数 Func_jp_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6733">The function Func_jp_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6734">找到 Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6734">A keyword from Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="c6011143-d087-451c-8313-7f6d4aed2270" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-my-number---corporate"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6772">日本我的号码 - 公司</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6772">Japan My Number - Corporate</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6773">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6773">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6774">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6774">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6775">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6775">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6776">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6776">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6777">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6777">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6778">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6778">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6779">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6779">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6780">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6780">13-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6781">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6781">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6782">13 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6782">13-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6783">一个数字，从 1 到 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6783">one digit from one to nine</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6784">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6784">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6785">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6785">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6786">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6786">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6787">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6787">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6788">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6788">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6789">函数Func_japanese_my_number_corporate查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6789">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6790">找到来自Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6790">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6791">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6791">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6792">函数Func_japanese_my_number_corporate查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6792">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Corporate -->
      <Entity id="9e0eaf79-ff20-4ffb-b3e4-e7368d5db6ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6793">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6793">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_japan_my_number_corporate"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6794">Keyword_japan_my_number_corporate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6794">Keyword_japan_my_number_corporate</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6798">マイナンバーカード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6798">マイナンバーカード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6799">マイナンバーカード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6799">マイナンバーカード番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6800">個人番号カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6800">個人番号カード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6801">個人識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6801">個人識別番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6802">個人識別ナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6802">個人識別ナンバー</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6803">法人番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6803">法人番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6804">指定通知書</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6804">指定通知書</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6806">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6806">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6807">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6807">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6808">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6808">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6809">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6809">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6810">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6810">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6811">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6811">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6812">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6812">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6813">12 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6813">12-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6814">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6814">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6815">12 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6815">12-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6816">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6816">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6817">可选空格、点或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6817">an optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6818">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6818">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6819">可选空格、点或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6819">an optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6820">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6820">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6821">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6821">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6822">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6822">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6823">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6823">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6824">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6824">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6825">函数Func_japanese_my_number_personal查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6825">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6826">找到来自Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6826">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6827">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6827">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6828">函数Func_japanese_my_number_personal查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6828">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Personal -->
      <Entity id="98da8e66-7299-4ebd-9f82-c871ab37d3ef" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6829">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6829">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_japan_my_number_personal"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6830">Keyword_japan_my_number_personal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6830">Keyword_japan_my_number_personal</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6831">my number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6831">my number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6832">マイナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6832">マイナンバー</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6833">個人番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6833">個人番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6834">共通番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6834">共通番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6835">マイナンバーカード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6835">マイナンバーカード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6836">マイナンバーカード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6836">マイナンバーカード番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6837">個人番号カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6837">個人番号カード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6838">個人識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6838">個人識別番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6839">個人識別ナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6839">個人識別ナンバー</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6840">通知カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6840">通知カード</span></span>


## <a name="japan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6841">日本护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6841">Japan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6842">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6842">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6843">两个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6843">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6844">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6844">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6845">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6845">two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6846">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6846">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6847">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6847">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6848">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6848">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6849">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6849">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6850">函数 Func_jp_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6850">The function Func_jp_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6851">找到 Keyword_jp_passport 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6851">A keyword from Keyword_jp_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="75177310-1a09-4613-bf6d-833aae3743f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6852">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6852">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6853">Keyword_jp_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6853">Keyword_jp_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6854">Passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6854">Passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6855">Passport Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6855">Passport Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6856">Passport No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6856">Passport No.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6857">Passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6857">Passport #</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6859">パスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6859">パスポート番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6860">パスポートナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6860">パスポートナンバー</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6861">パスポート＃</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6861">パスポート＃</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6862">パスポート#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6862">パスポート#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6863">パスポパスポパスポ。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6863">パスポートNo.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6864">旅券番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6864">旅券番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6865">旅券番号＃</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6865">旅券番号＃</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6866">旅券番号♯</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6866">旅券番号♯</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6867">旅券ナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6867">旅券ナンバー</span></span>


## <a name="japan-residence-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6868">日本居民身份证号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6868">Japan residence card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6869">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6869">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6870">12 个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6870">12 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6871">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6871">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6872">12 个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6872">12 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6873">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6873">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6874">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6874">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6875">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6875">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6876">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6876">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6877">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6877">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6878">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6878">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6879">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6879">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6880">正则表达式Regex_jp_residence_card_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6880">The regular expression Regex_jp_residence_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6881">找到来自Keyword_jp_residence_card_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6881">A keyword from Keyword_jp_residence_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Japan Residence Card Number-->
-<Entity id="ac36fef2-a289-4e2c-bb48-b02366e89fc0" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_jp_residence_card_number"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_residence_card_number"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6882">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6882">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_residence_card_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6883">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6883">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6884">居住地卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6884">Residence card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6885">居住卡否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6885">Residence card no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6886">居住卡#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6886">Residence card #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6887">在留カード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6887">在留カード番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6888">在留カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6888">在留カード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6889">在留番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6889">在留番号</span></span>

## <a name="japan-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6890">日本居民注册号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6890">Japan resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6891">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6891">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6892">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6892">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6893">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6893">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6894">11 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6894">11 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6895">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6895">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6896">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6896">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6897">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6897">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6898">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6898">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6899">函数 Func_jp_resident_registration_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6899">The function Func_jp_resident_registration_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6900">找到 Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6900">A keyword from Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="01c1209b-6389-4faf-a5f8-3f7e13899652" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_resident_registration_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6901">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6901">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_resident_registration_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6902">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6902">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6903">Resident Registration Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6903">Resident Registration Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6904">Residents Basic Registry Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6904">Residents Basic Registry Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6905">Resident Registration No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6905">Resident Registration No.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6906">Resident Register No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6906">Resident Register No.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6907">Residents Basic Registry No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6907">Residents Basic Registry No.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6908">Basic Resident Register No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6908">Basic Resident Register No.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6909">外国人登録証明書番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6909">外国人登録証明書番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6910">証明書番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6910">証明書番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6911">登録番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6911">登録番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6912">外国人登録証</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6912">外国人登録証</span></span>


## <a name="japan-social-insurance-number-sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6913">日本社会保险号码 (SIN) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6913">Japan social insurance number (SIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6914">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6914">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6915">7-12 个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6915">7-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6916">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6916">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6917">7-12 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6917">7-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6918">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6918">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6919">连字符 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6919">a hyphen (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6920">六个数字 OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6920">six digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6921">7-12 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6921">7-12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6922">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6922">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6923">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6923">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6924">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6924">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6925">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6925">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6926">函数 Func_jp_sin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6926">The function Func_jp_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6927">找到 Keyword_jp_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6927">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6928">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6928">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6929">函数 Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6929">The function Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6930">找到 Keyword_jp_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6930">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="c840e719-0896-45bb-84fd-1ed5c95e45ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin_pre_1997" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6951">拉脱维亚驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6951">Latvia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6952">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6952">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6953">三个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6953">three letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6954">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6954">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6955">三个字母和六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6955">three letters and six digits:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6956">三个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6956">three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6957">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6957">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6958">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6958">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6959">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6959">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6960">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6960">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6961">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6961">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6962">正则表达式查找  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6962">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-6963">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-6963">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Latvia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="ec996de0-30f2-46b1-b192-4d2ff8805fa7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7088">拉脱维亚个人代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7088">Latvia personal code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7089">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7089">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7090">11 个数字和一个可选连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7090">11 digits and an optional hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7091">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7091">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7092">旧格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7092">Old format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7093">11 个数字和连字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7093">11 digits and a hyphen:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7094">六个数字，对应于 DDMMYY (出生日期) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7094">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7095">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7095">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7096">一个数字，对应于 19 世纪 ("0"、20 世纪对应"1"和"21 世纪") </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7096">one digit that corresponds to the century of birth ("0" for 19th century, "1" for 20th century, and "2" for 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7097">四个数字，随机生成</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7097">four digits, randomly generated</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7098">新格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7098">New format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7099">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7099">11 digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7100">两个数字"32"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7100">Two digits "32"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7101">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7101">Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7102">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7102">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7103">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7103">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7104">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7104">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7105">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7105">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7106">函数  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 或正则表达式 `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` 找到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7106">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7107">找到 的  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7107">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7108">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7108">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7109">函数  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 或正则表达式 `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` 找到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7109">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Latvia Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="03fcf763-27c2-49ed-9422-2641c6c895c9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="latvia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7172">拉脱维亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7172">Latvia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7173">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7173">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7174">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字（没有空格或分隔符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7174">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7175">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7175">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7176">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7176">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7177">两个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7177">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7178">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7178">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7179">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7179">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7180">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7180">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7181">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7181">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7182">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7182">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7183">正则表达式查找  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7183">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7184">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7184">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7185">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` 格式为 DD.MM.YYYYY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7185">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7186">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7186">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7187">正则表达式查找  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7187">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7188">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7188">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Latvia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="23ae25ec-cc28-421b-b77a-3054eadf1ede" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7211">立陶宛驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7211">Lithuania driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7212">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7212">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7213">八个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7213">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7214">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7214">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7215">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7215">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7216">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7216">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7217">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7217">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7218">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7218">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7219">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7219">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7220">正则表达式查找  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7220">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7221">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7221">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="86f7628b-e0f4-4dc3-9fbc-e4300e4c7d78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7346">立陶宛个人代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7346">Lithuania personal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7347">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7347">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7348">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7348">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7349">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7349">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7350">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7350">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7351">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7351">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7352">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7352">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7353">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7353">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7354">11 个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7354">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7355">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7355">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7356">11 个数字，不带空格和分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7356">11 digits without spaces and delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7357">一个数字 (1-6) 对应于性别和出生日期的世纪</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7357">one digit (1-6) that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7358">六个数字，对应于出生日期 (YYMMDD) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7358">six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7359">三个数字，对应于出生日期的序列号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7359">three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7360">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7360">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7361">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7361">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7362">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7362">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7363">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7363">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7364">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7364">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7365">函数  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7365">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7366">找到 的  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7366">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7367">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7367">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7368">函数  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7368">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="cd6d3786-8ec3-4524-a2cf-1e0095379171" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7403">立陶宛护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7403">Lithuania passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7404">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7404">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7405">八个数字或字母，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7405">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7406">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7406">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7407">八个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7407">eight digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7408">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7408">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7409">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7409">not applicable</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7410">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7410">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7411">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7411">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7412">正则表达式查找  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7412">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7413">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7413">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7414">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date3` 格式为 DD MM YYYY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7414">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7415">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7415">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7416">正则表达式查找  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7416">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7417">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7417">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="1b79900f-047b-4c3f-846f-7d73b5534bce" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7431">paso numeris</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7431">paso numeris</span></span>

## <a name="luxemburg-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7437">百度达驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7437">Luxemburg driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7438">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7438">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7439">6 个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7439">six digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7440">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7440">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7441">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7441">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7442">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7442">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7443">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7443">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7444">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7444">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7445">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7445">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7446">正则表达式查找  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7446">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7447">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7447">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="89daf717-1544-4860-9a2e-fc9166dd8852" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7569">fahrerlaubnis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7569">fahrerlaubnis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7570">Führerschhrin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7570">Führerschäin</span></span>

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7571"> (的自然人的) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7571">Luxemburg national identification number (natural persons)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7572">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7572">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7573">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7573">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7574">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7574">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7575">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7575">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7576">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7576">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7577">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7577">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7578">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7578">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7579">13 个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7579">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7580">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7580">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7581">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7581">13 digits:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7582">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7582">11 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7583">两个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7583">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7584">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7584">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7585">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7585">yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7586">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7586">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7587">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7587">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7588">函数  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7588">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7589">找到 的  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7589">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7590">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7590">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7591">函数  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7591">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="aaf661ed-29ec-426d-8bf9-880cad298ebb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7614">百里达护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7614">Luxemburg passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7615">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7615">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7616">八个数字或字母，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7616">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7617">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7617">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7618">八个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7618">eight digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7619">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7619">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7620">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7620">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7621">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7621">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7622">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7622">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7623">正则表达式查找  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7623">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7624">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7624">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7625">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date3` 格式为 DD MM YYYY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7625">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7626">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7626">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7627">正则表达式查找  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7627">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7628">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7628">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="81d5c027-bed9-4421-91a0-3b2e55b3eb85" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
