## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-non-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7660">阿比塞卡 (非自然人的身份证号) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7660">Luxemburg national identification number (non-natural persons)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7661">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7661">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7662">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7662">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7663">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7663">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7664">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7664">11 digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7665">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7665">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7666">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7666">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7667">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7667">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7668">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7668">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7669">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7669">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7670">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7670">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7671">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7671">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7672">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7672">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7673">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7673">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7674">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7674">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7675">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7675">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7676">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7676">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7677">函数  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7677">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7678">找到 的  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7678">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7679">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7679">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7680">函数  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7680">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Non-natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="84bffa3a-d805-4788-a613-b1e4df3804cf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7693">sozialversécherung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7693">sozialversécherung</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7696">steier identifikatiounsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7696">steier identifikatiounsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7697">steier nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7697">steier nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7698">steuer id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7698">steuer id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7699">steueridentifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7699">steueridentifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7700">steuernummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7700">steuernummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7701">tax id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7701">tax id</span></span>

## <a name="malaysia-identification-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7720">马来西亚身份证号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7720">Malaysia identification card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7721">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7721">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7722">12 个数字（包含可选连字符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7722">12 digits containing optional hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7723">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7723">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7724">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7724">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7725">六个数字，格式为 YYMMDD，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7725">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7726">划线 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7726">a dash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7727">双字母的出生日期位置代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7727">two-letter place-of-birth code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7728">划线 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7728">a dash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7729">三个随机数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7729">three random digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7730">一位数性别代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7730">one-digit gender code</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7731">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7731">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7732">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7732">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7733">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7733">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7734">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7734">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7735">正则表达式 Regex_malaysia_id_card_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7735">The regular expression Regex_malaysia_id_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7736">找到 Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7736">A keyword from Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Malaysia ID Card Number -->
</Entity>
      <Entity id="7f0e921c-9677-435b-aba2-bb8f1013c749" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malaysia_id_card_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7737">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7737">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="malta-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7763">马耳他驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7763">Malta driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7764">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7764">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7765">指定模式中两个字符和六个数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7765">Combination of two characters and six digits in the specified pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7766">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7766">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7767">两个字符和六个数字的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7767">combination of two characters and six digits:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7768">两个字符 (数字或字母，不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7768">two characters (digits or letters, not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7769">一个 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7769">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7770">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7770">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7771">一个 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7771">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7772">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7772">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7773">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7773">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7774">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7774">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7775">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7775">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7776">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7776">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7777">正则表达式查找  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7777">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7778">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7778">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Malta Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="a3bdaa4a-8371-4735-8fa5-56ee0fb4afc4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7902">马耳他身份证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7902">Malta identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7903">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7903">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7904">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7904">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7905">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7905">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7906">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7906">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7907">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7907">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7908">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7908">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7909">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7909">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7910">七个数字后跟一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7910">seven digits followed by one letter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7911">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7911">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7912">七个数字后跟一个字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7912">seven digits followed by one letter:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7913">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7913">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7914">"M、G、A、P、L、H、B、Z"中的一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7914">one letter in "M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z" (case insensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7915">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7915">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7916">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7916">Not applicable</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7917">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7917">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7918">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7918">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7919">正则表达式查找  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7919">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7920">找到 的  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7920">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7921">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7921">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7922">正则表达式查找  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7922">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Malta Identity Card Number -->
      <Entity id="854b36b3-a388-4ac8-a4ec-677c2b5e4356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7939">马耳他护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7939">Malta passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7940">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7940">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7941">七个数字，不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7941">seven digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7942">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7942">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7943">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7943">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7944">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7944">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7945">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7945">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7946">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7946">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7947">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7947">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7948">正则表达式查找  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7948">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7949">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7949">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7950">找到的 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 关键字来自</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7950">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7951">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7951">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7952">正则表达式查找  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7952">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7953">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7953">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Malta Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="b2b21198-48f9-4d13-b2a5-03969bff0fb8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_malta_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7966">Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7966">Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7967">numru tal-passaport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7967">numru tal-passaport</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_date"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7970">Keywords_eu_passport_date</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7970">Keywords_eu_passport_date</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7971">发行日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7971">date of issue</span></span>

## <a name="malta-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7973">马耳他税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7973">Malta tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7974">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7974">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7975">对于马耳他语：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7975">For Maltese nationals:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7976">指定模式中的七个数字和一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7976">seven digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7977">非马耳他语公民和马耳他语实体：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7977">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7978">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7978">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7979">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7979">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7980">马耳他语：七个数字和一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7980">Maltese nationals: seven digits and one letter</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7981">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7981">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7982">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7982">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7983">非马耳他公民和马耳他实体：9 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7983">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: nine digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7984">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7984">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7985">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7985">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7986">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7986">Not applicable</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7987">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7987">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7988">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7988">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7989">正则表达式或  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7989">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7990">找到 的  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7990">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7991">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7991">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7992">正则表达式或  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7992">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Malta Tax ID Number -->
      <Entity id="ec830c63-65f4-45d0-9d8c-910dc8334b20" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7993">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7993">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-7994">Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-7994">Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8001">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni uniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8001">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni uniku</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8002">numru ta' identità uniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8002">numru ta' identità uniku</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8004">numru tat-taxxa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8004">numru tat-taxxa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8005">个人数字代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8005">personal numeric code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8006">tax id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8006">tax id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8007">tax identification no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8007">tax identification no</span></span>

## <a name="medicare-beneficiary-identifier-mbi-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8025">一个 MBI (的) 标识符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8025">Medicare Beneficiary Identifier (MBI) card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8026">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8026">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8027">11 个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8027">11 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8028">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8028">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8029">1 到 9 之间的一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8029">one digit between 1 to 9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8030">一个字母，不包括 S、L、O、I、B、Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8030">one letter excluding  S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8031">一个数字或字母，不包括 S、L、O、I、B、Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8031">one digit or letter excluding S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8032">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8032">one digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8033">可选连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8033">an optional Hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8034">一个字母，不包括 S、L、O、I、B、Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8034">one letter excluding  S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8035">一个数字或字母，不包括 S、L、O、I、B、Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8035">one digit or letter excluding S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8036">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8036">one digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8037">可选连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8037">an optional Hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8038">两个字母，不包括 S、L、O、I、B、Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8038">two letters excluding  S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8039">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8039">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8040">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8040">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8041">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8041">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8042">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8042">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8043">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8043">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8044">正则表达式查找  `Regex_mbi_card` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8044">The regular expression  `Regex_mbi_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8045">找到 的  `Keyword_mbi_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8045">A keyword from  `Keyword_mbi_card` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8046">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8046">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8047">正则表达式查找  `Regex_mbi_card` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8047">The regular expression  `Regex_mbi_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Medicare Beneficiary Identifier (MBI) card -->
      <Entity id="f753a286-f5cc-47e6-a592-4be25fd02591" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_mbi_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_mbi_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_mbi_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8048">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8048">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_mbi_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8049">Keyword_mbi_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8049">Keyword_mbi_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8050">mbi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8050">mbi</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8051">mbi#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8051">mbi#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8052">一名收入#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8052">medicare beneficiary #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8053">一个优势标识符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8053">medicare beneficiary identifier</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8054">一名受益者否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8054">medicare beneficiary no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8055">一名收入者编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8055">medicare beneficiary number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8056">一名收入#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8056">medicare beneficiary#</span></span>


## <a name="mexico-unique-population-registry-code-curp"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8057">墨西哥唯一总体注册表代码 (CURP) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8057">Mexico Unique Population Registry Code (CURP)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8058">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8058">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8059">18 个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8059">18 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8060">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8060">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8061">四个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8061">four letters (case insensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8062">六个数字，表示有效日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8062">six digits indicating a valid date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8063">字母 - H/h 或 M/m</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8063">a letter - H/h or M/m</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8064">指示有效"墨西哥"状态代码的两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8064">two letters indicating a valid Mexican state code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8065">三个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8065">three letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8066">一个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8066">one letter or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8067">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8067">one digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8068">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8068">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8069">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8069">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8070">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8070">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8071">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8071">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8072">函数  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8072">The function  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8073">找到 的  `Keyword_mexico_population_registry_code` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8073">A keyword from  `Keyword_mexico_population_registry_code` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8074">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8074">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8075">函数  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8075">The function  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Mexico Unique Population Registry Code (CURP) -->
      <Entity id="e905ad4d-5a74-406d-bf36-b1efca798af4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_mexico_population_registry_code" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_mexico_population_registry_code" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_mexico_population_registry_code" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8076">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8076">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_mexico_population_registry_code"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8077">Keyword_mexico_population_registry_code</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8077">Keyword_mexico_population_registry_code</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8078">Clave Única de Registro de Población</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8078">Clave Única de Registro de Población</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8079">Clave Unica de Registro de Poblacion</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8079">Clave Unica de Registro de Poblacion</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8080">唯一填充注册表代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8080">Unique Population Registry Code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8081">唯一总体代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8081">unique population code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8082">CURP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8082">CURP</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8083">个人 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8083">Personal ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8084">唯一 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8084">Unique ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8085">personalid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8085">personalid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8086">personalidnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8086">personalidnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8087">uniqueidkey</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8087">uniqueidkey</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8088">uniqueidnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8088">uniqueidnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8089">clave única</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8089">clave única</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8090">clave unica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8090">clave unica</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8091">clave 个人 Identidad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8091">clave personal Identidad</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8092">personal Identidad Clave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8092">personal Identidad Clave</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8093">ClaveÚnica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8093">ClaveÚnica</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8094">claveunica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8094">claveunica</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8095">clavepersonalIdentidad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8095">clavepersonalIdentidad</span></span>


## <a name="netherlands-citizens-service-bsn-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8096">荷兰公民服务号码 (BSN) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8096">Netherlands citizen's service (BSN) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8097">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8097">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8098">包含可选空格的八个或九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8098">eight or nine digits containing optional spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8099">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8099">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8100">八个九个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8100">eight-nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8101">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8101">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8102">一个 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8102">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8103">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8103">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8104">一个 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8104">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8105">2-3 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8105">two-three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8106">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8106">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8107">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8107">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8108">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8108">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8109">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8109">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8110">函数 Func_netherlands_bsn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8110">The function Func_netherlands_bsn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8111">找到 Keyword_netherlands_bsn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8111">A keyword from Keyword_netherlands_bsn is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8112">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8112">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Citizen's Service (BSN) Number -->
      <Entity id="c5f54253-ef7e-44f6-a578-440ed67e946d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_bsn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8121">个人数字代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8121">personal numeric code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8122">与人员相关的号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8122">person-related number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8123">persoonlijk nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8123">persoonlijk nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8124">persoonlijke numerieke 代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8124">persoonlijke numerieke code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8125">persoonsgeoonden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8125">persoonsgebonden</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8126">persoonsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8126">persoonsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8127">sociaal-fiscaal nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8127">sociaal-fiscaal nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8128">social-fiscal number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8128">social-fiscal number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8129">sofi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8129">sofi</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8130">sofinummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8130">sofinummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8131">uniek identificatienummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8131">uniek identificatienummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8132">uniek identit一snummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8132">uniek identiteitsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8133">唯一标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8133">unique identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8134">唯一标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8134">unique identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8135">uniqueidentityno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8135">uniqueidentityno#</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8136">荷兰驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8136">Netherlands driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8137">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8137">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8138">不带空格和分隔符的 10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8138">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8139">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8139">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8140">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8140">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8141">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8141">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8142">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8142">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8143">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8143">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8144">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8144">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8145">正则表达式查找  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8145">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8146">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8146">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="6247fbea-ab80-4be5-8233-308b7c031401" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8274">荷兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8274">Netherlands passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8275">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8275">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8276">九个字母或数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8276">nine letters or digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8277">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8277">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8278">九个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8278">nine letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8279">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8279">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8280">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8280">not applicable</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8281">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8281">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8282">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8282">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8283">正则表达式查找  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8283">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8284">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8284">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8285">正则表达式查找格式 `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date` 为 DD MMM/MMM YYYYY (Example - 26 MAA/MAR 2012) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8285">The regular expression `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format  DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 26 MAA/MAR 2012)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8286">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8286">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8287">正则表达式查找  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8287">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8288">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8288">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="61786727-bafd-45f6-94d9-888d815e228e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8306">荷兰税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8306">Netherlands tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8307">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8307">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8308">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8308">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8309">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8309">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8310">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8310">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8311">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8311">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8312">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8312">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8313">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8313">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8314">九个数字，不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8314">nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8315">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8315">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8316">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8316">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8317">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8317">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8318">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8318">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8319">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8319">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8320">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8320">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8321">函数  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8321">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8322">找到 的  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8322">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8323">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8323">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8324">函数  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8324">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="01f42a64-eba7-4892-a67b-398237e4ade2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8362">荷兰增值税编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8362">Netherlands value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8363">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8363">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8364">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8364">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8365">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8365">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8366">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8366">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8367">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8367">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8368">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8368">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8369">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8369">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8370">14 个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8370">14 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8371">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8371">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8372">14 字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8372">14-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8373">N 或 n</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8373">N or n</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8374">L 或 l</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8374">L or l</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8375">可选空格、点或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8375">optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8376">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8376">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8377">可选空格、点或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8377">optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8378">B 或 b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8378">B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8379">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8379">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8380">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8380">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8381">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8381">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8382">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8382">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8383">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8383">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8384">函数Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8384">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8385">找到来自Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8385">A keyword from Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8386">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8386">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8387">函数Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8387">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="4f320d9b-4972-41ae-b337-88d499bb1ade" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8396">新西兰银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8396">New Zealand bank account number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8397">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8397">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8398">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8398">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8399">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8399">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8400">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8400">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8401">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8401">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8402">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8402">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8403">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8403">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8404">带可选分隔符的 14 位到 16 位模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8404">14-digit to 16-digit pattern with optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8405">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8405">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8406">带可选分隔符的 14 位到 16 位模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8406">14-digit to 16-digit pattern with optional delimiter:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8407">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8407">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8408">可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8408">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8409">三到四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8409">three to four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8410">可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8410">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8411">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8411">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8412">可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8412">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8413">两到三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8413">two to three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8414">选项连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8414">an options hyphen or space</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8415">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8415">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8416">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8416">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8417">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8417">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8418">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8418">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8419">函数Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8419">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8420">找到来自Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8420">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8421">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8421">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8422">函数Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8422">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Bank Account Number -->
      <Entity id="1a97fc2b-dd2f-48f1-bc4e-2ddf25813956" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zFealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8423">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8423">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_bank_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8424">Keyword_new_zealand_bank_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8424">Keyword_new_zealand_bank_account_number</span></span>

## <a name="new-zealand-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8430">新西兰驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8430">New Zealand driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8431">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8431">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8432">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8432">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8433">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8433">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8434">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8434">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8435">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8435">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8436">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8436">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8437">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8437">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8438">八个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8438">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8439">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8439">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8440">八个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8440">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8441">两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8441">two letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8442">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8442">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8443">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8443">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8444">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8444">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8445">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8445">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8446">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8446">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8447">函数Func_newzealand_driver_license_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8447">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8448">找到来自Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8448">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8449">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8449">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8450">函数Func_newzealand_driver_license_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8450">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Driver License Number -->
      <Entity id="1924b377-d287-49c9-a737-cfe7a8a2615a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-inland-revenue-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8517">新西兰的收入数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8517">New Zealand inland revenue number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8518">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8518">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8519">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8519">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8520">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8520">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8521">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8521">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8522">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8522">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8523">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8523">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8524">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8524">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8525">八个或九个数字（带可选分隔符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8525">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8526">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8526">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8527">八个或九个数字（带可选分隔符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8527">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8528">两个或三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8528">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8529">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8529">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8530">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8530">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8531">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8531">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8532">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8532">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8533">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8533">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8534">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8534">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8535">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8535">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8536">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8536">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8537">函数Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8537">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8538">找到来自Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8538">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8539">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8539">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8540">函数Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8540">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Inland Revenue Number -->
      <Entity id="dd0fe2bc-7bcf-455f-bac1-83b1e3eb25fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8541">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8541">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8542">Keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8542">Keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8543">否。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8543">ird no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8544">ird 否#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8544">ird no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8545">nz ird</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8545">nz ird</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8546">新西兰 ird</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8546">new zealand ird</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8547">ird number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8547">ird number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8548">一元收入数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8548">inland revenue number</span></span>


## <a name="new-zealand-ministry-of-health-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8549">新西兰卫生服务局号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8549">New Zealand ministry of health number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8550">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8550">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8551">三个字母，一 (可选) 和四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8551">three letters, a space (optional), and four digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8552">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8552">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8553">三个字母 (区分大小写) "I"和"O"除外</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8553">three letters (not case-sensitive) except 'I' and 'O'</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8554">一个 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8554">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8555">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8555">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8556">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8556">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8557">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8557">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8558">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8558">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8559">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8559">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8560">函数 Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8560">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8561">找到 Keyword_nz_terms 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8561">A keyword from Keyword_nz_terms is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8562">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8562">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8563">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8563">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8564">函数 Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8564">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8565">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8565">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- New Zealand Health Number -->
    <Entity id="2b71c1c8-d14e-4430-82dc-fd1ed6bf05c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_nz_terms" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
       </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```
