## <a name="new-zealand-social-welfare-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8579">新西兰社会电话号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8579">New Zealand social welfare number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8580">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8580">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8581">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8581">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8582">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8582">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8583">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8583">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8584">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8584">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8585">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8585">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8586">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8586">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8587">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8587">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8588">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8588">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8589">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8589">nine digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8590">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8590">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8591">可选连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8591">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8592">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8592">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8593">可选连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8593">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8594">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8594">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8595">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8595">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8596">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8596">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8597">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8597">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8598">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8598">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8599">函数Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8599">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8600">找到来自Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8600">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8601">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8601">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8602">函数Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8602">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Newzealand Social Welfare Number -->
      <Entity id="20f3c48d-4ac1-4cd2-86bd-34ecc1826e9d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8603">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8603">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8604">Keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8604">Keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8605">社交 <2> <2> <3>#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8605">social welfare #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8606">社交 <2> <2> <3>#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8606">social welfare#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8607">social一号。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8607">social welfare No.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8608">social 时号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8608">social welfare number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8609">swn#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8609">swn#</span></span>


## <a name="norway-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8610">挪威标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8610">Norway identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8611">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8611">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8612">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8612">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8613">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8613">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8614">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8614">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8615">六个数字，格式为 DDMMYY，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8615">six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8616">三位数个人号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8616">three-digit individual number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8617">两个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8617">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8618">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8618">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8619">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8619">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8620">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8620">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8621">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8621">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8622">函数 Func_norway_id_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8622">The function Func_norway_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8623">找到 Keyword_norway_id_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8623">A keyword from Keyword_norway_id_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8624">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8624">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8625">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8625">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8626">函数 Func_norway_id_numbe 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8626">The function Func_norway_id_numbe finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8627">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8627">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Norway Identification Number -->
<Entity id="d4c8a798-e9f2-4bd3-9652-500d24080fc3" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8628">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8628">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_norway_id_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8629">Keyword_norway_id_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8629">Keyword_norway_id_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8630">Personal identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8630">Personal identification number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8632">ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8632">ID Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8633">标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8633">Identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8634">Personnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8634">Personnummer</span></span>

## <a name="philippines-unified-multi-purpose-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8636">菲律宾统一的多用途标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8636">Philippines unified multi-purpose identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8637">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8637">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8638">12 个数字，通过连字符分隔 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8638">12 digits separated by hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8639">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8639">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8640">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8640">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8641">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8641">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8642">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8642">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8643">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8643">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8644">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8644">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8645">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8645">one digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8646">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8646">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8647">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8647">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8648">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8648">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8649">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8649">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8650">正则表达式 Regex_philippines_unified_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8650">The regular expression Regex_philippines_unified_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8651">找到 Keyword_philippines_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8651">A keyword from Keyword_philippines_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Philippines Unified Multi-Purpose ID number -->
<Entity id="019b39dd-8c25-4765-91a3-d9c6baf3c3b3" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_philippines_unified_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_philippines_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8652">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8652">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_philippines_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8653">Keyword_philippines_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8653">Keyword_philippines_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8654">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8654">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8655">UMID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8655">UMID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8656">Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8656">Identity Card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8657">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8657">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span></span>

## <a name="poland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8658">波兰驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8658">Poland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8659">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8659">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8660">14 个数字，包含两个正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8660">14 digits containing two forward slashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8661">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8661">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8662">14 个数字和两个正斜杠：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8662">14 digits and two forward slashes:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8663">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8663">five digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8664">正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8664">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8665">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8665">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8666">正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8666">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8667">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8667">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8668">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8668">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8669">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8669">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8670">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8670">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8671">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8671">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8672">正则表达式查找  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8672">The regular expression  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8673">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8673">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="24d51f99-ee9e-4060-a077-cae58cab1ee4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8674">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8674">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8675">Keywords_eu_driver s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8675">Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8676">driverlic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8676">driverlic</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8677">driverlics</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8677">driverlics</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8678">driverlicense</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8678">driverlicense</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8679">driverlicenses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8679">driverlicenses</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8680">driverlicence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8680">driverlicence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8681">driverlicences</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8681">driverlicences</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8682">driver lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8682">driver lic</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8683">driver lics</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8683">driver lics</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8684">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8684">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8685">driver licenses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8685">driver licenses</span></span>

## <a name="poland-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8797">波兰身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8797">Poland identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8798">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8798">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8799">三个字母和六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8799">three letters and six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8800">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8800">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8801">三个字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8801">three letters (not case-sensitive) followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8802">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8802">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8803">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8803">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8804">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8804">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8805">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8805">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8806">函数 Func_polish_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8806">The function Func_polish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8807">找到 Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8807">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8808">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8808">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Identity Card-->
<Entity id="25E64989-ED5D-40CA-A939-6C14183BB7BF" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8809">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8809">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8810">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8810">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8811">）Osobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8811">Dowód osobisty</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8814">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8814">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span></span>

## <a name="poland-national-id-pesel"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8819">波兰国家/ (PESEL) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8819">Poland national ID (PESEL)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8820">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8820">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8821">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8821">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8822">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8822">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8823">六个数字，表示 YYMMDD 格式的出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8823">six digits representing date of birth in the format YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8824">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8824">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8825">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8825">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8826">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8826">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8827">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8827">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8828">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8828">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8829">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8829">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8830">函数 Func_pesel_identification_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8830">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8831">找到 Keyword_pesel_identification_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8831">A keyword from Keyword_pesel_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8832">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8832">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8833">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8833">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8834">函数 Func_pesel_identification_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8834">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8835">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8835">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland National ID (PESEL) -->
      <Entity id="E3AAF206-4297-412F-9E06-BA8487E22456" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8836">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8836">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_pesel_identification_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8837">Keyword_pesel_identification_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8837">Keyword_pesel_identification_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8838">dowód osobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8838">dowód osobisty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8839">dowódosobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8839">dowódosobisty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8840">niepowtarzalny numer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8840">niepowtarzalny numer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8841">niepowtarzalnynumer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8841">niepowtarzalnynumer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8842">nr.-pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8842">nr.-pesel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8843">nr-pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8843">nr-pesel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8844">numer identyfikacyjny</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8844">numer identyfikacyjny</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8845">pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8845">pesel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8846">tożsamości narodowej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8846">tożsamości narodowej</span></span>


## <a name="poland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8847">波兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8847">Poland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8848">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟护照号码敏感信息类型中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8848">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8849">它还作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8849">It's also available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8850">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8850">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8851">两个字母和七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8851">two letters and seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8852">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8852">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8853">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8853">Two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8854">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8854">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8855">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8855">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8856">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8856">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8857">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8857">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8858">函数 `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8858">The function `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8859">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8859">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8860">找到 或 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8860">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8861">找到 的 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8861">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8862">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8862">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8863">函数 `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8863">The function `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8864">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8864">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8865">找到 或 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8865">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8866">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8866">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8867">函数 `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8867">The function `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8868">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8868">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="03937FB5-D2B6-4487-B61F-0F8BFF7C3517" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number_v2" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number_v2" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number_v2" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8869">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8869">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8870">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8870">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8873">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8873">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8874">passports</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8874">passports</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8877">passportnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8877">passportnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8878">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8878">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8879">passportnumbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8879">passportnumbers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8880">passport numbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8880">passport numbers</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_polish_national_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8881">Keyword_polish_national_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8881">Keyword_polish_national_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8882">numer paszportu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8882">numer paszportu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8883">numery paszportów</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8883">numery paszportów</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8884">numery paszportowe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8884">numery paszportowe</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8885">nr paszportu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8885">nr paszportu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8886">nr.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8886">nr.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8887">paszportu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8887">paszportu</span></span>

## <a name="poland-regon-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8894">波兰 REGON 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8894">Poland REGON number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8895">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8895">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8896">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8896">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8897">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8897">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8898">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8898">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8899">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8899">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8900">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8900">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8901">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8901">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8902">9 位数字或 14 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8902">9-digit or 14-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8903">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8903">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8904">九位数字或 14 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8904">nine digit or 14-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8905">九个数字或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8905">nine digits or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8906">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8906">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8907">hyphen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8907">hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8908">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8908">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8909">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8909">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8910">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8910">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8911">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8911">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8912">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8912">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8913">函数Func_polish_regon_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8913">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8914">找到来自Keywords_polish_regon_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8914">A keyword from Keywords_polish_regon_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8915">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8915">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8916">函数Func_polish_regon_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8916">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Polish REGON Number  -->
      <Entity id="fc87b421-f437-4f8b-b739-29a735ead0d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8920">统计数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8920">statistical number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8921">统计 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8921">statistical id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8922">统计否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8922">statistical no</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8925">regonno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8925">regonno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8926">公司 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8926">company id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8927">companyid#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8927">companyid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8928">companyidno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8928">companyidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8929">numer statystyczny</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8929">numer statystyczny</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8930">numeru regon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8930">numeru regon</span></span>

## <a name="poland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8933">波兰税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8933">Poland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8934">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8934">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8935">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8935">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8936">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8936">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8937">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8937">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8938">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8938">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8939">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8939">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8940">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8940">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8941">11 个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8941">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8942">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8942">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8943">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8943">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8944">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8944">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8945">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8945">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8946">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8946">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8947">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8947">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8948">函数  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8948">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8949">找到 的  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8949">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span>


```xml
      <!-- Poland Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="1ff28b4d-40f2-49e9-b677-9606a88e2bca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-citizen-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8979">葡萄牙公民卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8979">Portugal citizen card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8980">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8980">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8981">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8981">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8982">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8982">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8983">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8983">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8984">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8984">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8985">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8985">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8986">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8986">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8987">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8987">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8988">正则表达式 Regex_portugal_citizen_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8988">The regular expression Regex_portugal_citizen_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-8989">找到 Keyword_portugal_citizen_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-8989">A keyword from Keyword_portugal_citizen_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Portugal Citizen Card Number -->
<Entity id="91a7ece2-add4-4986-9a15-c84544d81ecd" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_citizen_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_portugal_citizen_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9009">葡萄牙驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9009">Portugal driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9010">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9010">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9011">两个模式 - 两个字母后跟 5-8 个数字（带特殊字符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9011">two patterns - two letters followed by 5-8 digits with special characters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9012">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9012">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9013">模式 1：两个字母后跟 5/6 特殊字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9013">Pattern 1: Two letters followed by 5/6 with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9014">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9014">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9015">一个连字符 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9015">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9016">五个或六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9016">Five or Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9017">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9017">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9018">一位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9018">One digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9019">模式 2：一个字母后跟 6/8 个数字（带特殊字符）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9019">Pattern 2: One letter followed by 6/8 digits with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9020">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9020">One letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9021">一个连字符 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9021">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9022">六个或八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9022">Six or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9023">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9023">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9024">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9024">One digit</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9025">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9025">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9026">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9026">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9027">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9027">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9028">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9028">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9029">正则表达式查找  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9029">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9030">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9030">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Portugal Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="977f1e5a-2c33-4bcc-b516-95bb275cff23" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9162">葡萄牙护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9162">Portugal passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9163">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9163">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9164">一个字母后跟 6 个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9164">one letter followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9165">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9165">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9166">一个字母后跟六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9166">one letter followed by six digits:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9167">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9167">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9168">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9168">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9169">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9169">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9170">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9170">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9171">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9171">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9172">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9172">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9173">正则表达式查找  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9173">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9174">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9174">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9175">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` 格式为 DD.MM.YYYYY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9175">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9176">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9176">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9177">正则表达式查找  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9177">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9178">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9178">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Portugal Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="080a52fd-a7bc-431e-b54d-51f08f59db11" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9179">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9179">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="portugal-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9205">葡萄牙税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9205">Portugal tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9206">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9206">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9207">九个数字（带可选空格）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9207">nine digits with optional spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9208">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9208">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9209">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9209">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9210">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9210">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9211">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9211">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9212">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9212">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9213">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9213">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9214">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9214">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9215">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9215">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9216">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9216">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9217">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9217">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9218">函数  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9218">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9219">找到 的  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9219">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9220">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9220">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9221">函数  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9221">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Portugal Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="65372402-3131-4f1e-9983-4439841d1f15" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9239">一些#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9239">taxidnumber#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9241">taxnumber#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9241">taxnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9242">taxnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9242">taxnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9243">tin id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9243">tin id</span></span>

## <a name="romania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9246">罗马尼亚驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9246">Romania driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9247">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9247">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9248">一个字符后跟八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9248">one character followed by eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9249">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9249">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9250">一个字符后跟八个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9250">one character followed by eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9251">一个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9251">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9252">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9252">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9253">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9253">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9254">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9254">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9255">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9255">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9256">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9256">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9257">正则表达式查找  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9257">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9258">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9258">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Romania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="b5511ace-2fd8-4ae4-b6fc-c7c6e4689e3c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-personal-numeric-code-cnp"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9386">使用 CNP (罗马尼亚个人) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9386">Romania personal numeric code (CNP)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9387">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9387">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9388">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9388">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9389">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9389">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9390">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9390">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9391">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9391">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9392">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9392">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9393">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9393">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9394">不带空格和分隔符的 13 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9394">13 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9395">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9395">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9396">一个数字，从 1 到 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9396">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9397">六个数字，表示 YYMMDD (出生日期) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9397">six digits representing date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9398">两个数字，可以是 01-52 或 99</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9398">two digits, which can be 01-52 or 99</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9399">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9399">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9400">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9400">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9401">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9401">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9402">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9402">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9403">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9403">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9404">函数  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9404">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9405">找到 的  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9405">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9406">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9406">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9407">函数  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9407">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Romania Personal Numerical Code (CNP) -->
      <Entity id="eb5fa399-fe28-4c67-8188-d63a616ed89c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9458">罗马尼亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9458">Romania passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9459">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9459">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9460">八个或九个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9460">eight or nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9461">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9461">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9462">八个或九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9462">eight or nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9463">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9463">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9464">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9464">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9465">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9465">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9466">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9466">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9467">正则表达式查找  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9467">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9468">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9468">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9469">正则表达式查找 `Regex_romania_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YY 格式的日期 (示例- 01 2 月/2 月 10) 或找到的 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9469">The regular expression `Regex_romania_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YY (Example- 01 FEB/FEB 10) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9470">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9470">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9471">正则表达式查找  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9471">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9472">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9472">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Romania Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="5d31b90c-7fe2-4a76-a14b-767b8fd19d6c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9473">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9473">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9474">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9474">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9475">passport#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9475">passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9476">passport#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9476">passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9477">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9477">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9478">passports</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9478">passports</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9479">passportno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9479">passportno</span></span>

## <a name="russia-passport-number-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9490">俄罗斯护照号码国内</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9490">Russia passport number domestic</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9491">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9491">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9492">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9492">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9493">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9493">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9494">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9494">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9495">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9495">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9496">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9496">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9497">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9497">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9498">10 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9498">10-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9499">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9499">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9500">10 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9500">10-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9501">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9501">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9502">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9502">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9503">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9503">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9504">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9504">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9505">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9505">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9506">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9506">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9507">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9507">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9508">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9508">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9509">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9509">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9510">正则表达式Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9510">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9511">找到来自Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9511">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number Domestic -->
      <Entity id="76ec2f5d-cedb-48e1-8070-1998794af445" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="russia-passport-number-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9528">俄罗斯护照号码国际</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9528">Russia passport number international</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9534">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9534">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9535">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9535">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9536">九位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9536">nine-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9537">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9537">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9538">九位数：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9538">nine-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9539">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9539">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9540">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9540">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9542">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9542">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9543">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9543">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9544">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9544">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9545">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9545">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9546">正则表达式Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9546">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9547">找到来自Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9547">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number International -->
      <Entity id="ac5f4878-75e4-4b82-af2d-02e13ea9f411" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
