## <a name="saudi-arabia-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9564">沙特阿拉伯国家 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9564">Saudi Arabia National ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9565">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9565">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9566">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9566">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9567">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9567">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9568">10 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9568">10 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9569">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9569">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9570">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9570">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9571">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9571">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9572">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9572">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9573">正则表达式 Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9573">The regular expression Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9574">找到 Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9574">A keyword from Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Saudi Arabia National ID -->
<Entity id="8c5a0ba8-404a-41a3-8871-746aa21ee6c0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9575">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9575">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9576">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9576">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9577">Identification Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9577">Identification Card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9578">I card number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9578">I card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9579">ID number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9579">ID number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9580">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9580">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span></span>


## <a name="singapore-national-registration-identity-card-nric-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9581">新加坡国家注册身份证号码 (NRIC) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9581">Singapore national registration identity card (NRIC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9582">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9582">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9583">九个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9583">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9584">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9584">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9585">九个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9585">nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9586">字母"F"、"G"、"S"或"T" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9586">the letter "F", "G", "S", or "T" (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9587">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9587">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9588">字母检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9588">an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9589">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9589">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9590">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9590">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9591">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9591">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9592">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9592">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9593">正则表达式 Regex_singapore_nric 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9593">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9594">找到 Keyword_singapore_nric 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9594">A keyword from Keyword_singapore_nric is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9595">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9595">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9596">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9596">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9597">正则表达式 Regex_singapore_nric 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9597">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9598">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9598">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Singapore National Registration Identity Card (NRIC) Number -->
<Entity id="cead390a-dd83-4856-9751-fb6dc98c34da" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9603">NRIC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9603">NRIC</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9604">IC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9604">IC</span></span>

## <a name="slovakia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9609">斯洛伐克驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9609">Slovakia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9610">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9610">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9611">一个字符后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9611">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9612">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9612">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9613">一个字符后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9613">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9614">一个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9614">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9615">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9615">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9616">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9616">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9617">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9617">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9618">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9618">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9619">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9619">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9620">正则表达式查找  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9620">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9621">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9621">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="14240c22-b6de-4ce5-a90b-137f74252513" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-personal-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9747">斯洛伐克个人号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9747">Slovakia personal number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9748">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9748">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9749">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9749">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9750">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9750">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9751">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9751">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9752">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9752">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9753">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9753">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9754">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9754">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9755">九个或 10 个数字，包含可选反杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9755">nine or 10 digits containing optional backslash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9756">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9756">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9757">六个数字，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9757">six digits representing date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9758">可选斜杠 (/) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9758">optional slash (/)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9759">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9759">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9760">一个可选检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9760">one optional check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9761">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9761">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9762">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9762">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9763">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9763">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9764">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9764">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9765">函数  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9765">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9766">找到 的  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9766">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9767">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9767">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9768">函数  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9768">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Personal Number -->
      <Entity id="951c26b7-3b35-4f73-924b-15dd599cb9ab" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="slovakia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9815">斯洛伐克护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9815">Slovakia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9816">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9816">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9817">一个数字或字母后跟七个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9817">one digit or letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9818">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9818">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9819">一个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9819">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9820">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9820">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9821">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9821">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9822">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9822">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9823">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9823">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9824">正则表达式查找  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9824">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9825">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9825">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9826">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` 格式为 DD.MM.YYYYY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9826">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9827">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9827">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9828">正则表达式查找  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9828">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9829">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9829">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="238e1f08-d80e-4793-af33-9b57918335b7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9851">斯洛文尼亚驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9851">Slovenia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9852">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9852">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9853">九个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9853">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9854">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9854">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9855">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9855">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9856">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9856">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9857">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9857">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9858">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9858">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9859">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9859">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9860">正则表达式查找  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9860">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9861">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9861">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5bc089a-f2ee-433d-a6b1-5c253051d6f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-unique-master-citizen-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9988">斯洛文尼亚唯一主公民编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9988">Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9989">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9989">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9990">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9990">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9991">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9991">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9992">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9992">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9993">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9993">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9994">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9994">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9995">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9995">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9996">不带空格或分隔符的 13 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9996">13 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9997">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9997">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9998">指定模式中的 13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9998">13 digits in the specified pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-9999">对应于出生日期的七个数字 (DDMMLLL) 其中"LLL"对应于出生日期的最后三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-9999">seven digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMLLL) where "LLL" corresponds to the last three digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10000">两个数字，对应于出生日期"50"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10000">two digits that correspond to the area of birth "50"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10001">三个数字，对应于同一天的人的性别和序列号的组合。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10001">three digits that correspond to a combination of gender and serial number for persons born on the same day.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10002">000-499（男性）和 500-999（针对男性）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10002">000-499 for male and 500-999 for female.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10003">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10003">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10004">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10004">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10005">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10005">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10006">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10006">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10007">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10007">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10008">函数  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10008">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10009">找到 的  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10009">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10010">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10010">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10011">函数  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10011">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number -->
      <Entity id="68948b27-803d-41e4-adf1-13e05eb541bb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10039">斯洛文尼亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10039">Slovenia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10040">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10040">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10041">两个字母后跟七个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10041">two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10042">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10042">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10043">两个字母后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10043">two letters followed by seven digits:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10044">字母"P"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10044">the letter "P"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10045">一个小写字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10045">one uppercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10046">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10046">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10047">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10047">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10048">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10048">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10049">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10049">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10050">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10050">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10051">正则表达式查找  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10051">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10052">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10052">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10053">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` 格式为 DD.MM.YYYYY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10053">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10054">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10054">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10055">正则表达式查找  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10055">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10056">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10056">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="235b7976-7bbe-4df5-bb40-08678e749d1a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10070">个tevilka potnega lista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10070">številka potnega lista</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10074">potni 列表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10074">potni list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10075">个tevilke potnih listov</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10075">številke potnih listov</span></span>

## <a name="slovenia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10079">斯洛文尼亚税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10079">Slovenia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10080">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10080">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10081">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10081">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10082">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10082">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10083">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10083">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10084">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10084">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10085">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10085">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10086">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10086">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10087">八个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10087">eight digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10088">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10088">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10089">一个数字，从 1 到 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10089">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10090">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10090">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10091">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10091">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10092">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10092">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10093">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10093">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10094">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10094">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10095">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10095">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10096">函数  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10096">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10097">找到 的  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10097">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10098">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10098">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10099">函数  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10099">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="e47b071e-c352-4d70-8241-8c215ad65505" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10100">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10100">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10101">Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10101">Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10102">dav-na gamtevilka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10102">davčna številka</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10103">identifikacijska tevilka davka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10103">identifikacijska številka davka</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10104">gamtevilka dav的ne datoatoatoe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10104">številka davčne datoteke</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10105">tax file no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10105">tax file no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10106">tax file number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10106">tax file number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10107">tax id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10107">tax id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10108">tax identification no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10108">tax identification no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10109">tax identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10109">tax identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10110">tax no#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10110">tax no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10111">tax no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10111">tax no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10112">tax number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10112">tax number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10113">tax registration number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10113">tax registration number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10114">已#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10114">taxid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10115">一些#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10115">taxidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10116">一些#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10116">taxidnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10117">taxno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10117">taxno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10118">taxnumber#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10118">taxnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10119">taxnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10119">taxnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10120">tin id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10120">tin id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10121">tin no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10121">tin no</span></span>

## <a name="south-africa-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10123">南非标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10123">South Africa identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10124">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10124">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10125">13 个数字（可能包含空格）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10125">13 digits that may contain spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10126">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10126">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10127">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10127">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10128">六个数字，格式为 YYMMDD，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10128">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10129">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10129">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10130">单数字公民指示符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10130">a single-digit citizenship indicator</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10131">数字"8"或"9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10131">the digit "8" or "9"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10132">一个数字，即校验和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10132">one digit, which is a checksum digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10133">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10133">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10134">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10134">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10135">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10135">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10136">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10136">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10137">函数 Func_south_africa_identification_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10137">The function Func_south_africa_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10138">找到 Keyword_south_africa_identification_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10138">A keyword from Keyword_south_africa_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10139">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10139">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Africa Identification Number -->
<Entity id="e2adf7cb-8ea6-4048-a2ed-d89eb65f2780" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_africa_identification_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_africa_identification_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10140">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10140">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_south_africa_identification_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10141">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10141">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10142">Identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10142">Identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10143">ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10143">ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10144">标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10144">Identification</span></span>

## <a name="south-korea-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10145">韩国居民注册号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10145">South Korea resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10146">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10146">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10147">13 个数字（包含连字符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10147">13 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10148">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10148">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10149">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10149">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10150">六个数字，格式为 YYMMDD，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10150">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10151">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10151">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10152">一个数字，由世纪和性别决定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10152">one digit determined by the century and gender</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10153">四位数的出生日期区域代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10153">four-digit region-of-birth code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10154">一个数字，用于区分前面数字完全相同的人</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10154">one digit used to differentiate people for whom the preceding numbers are identical</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10155">一个检查数字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10155">a check digit.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10156">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10156">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10157">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10157">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10158">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10158">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10159">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10159">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10160">函数 Func_south_korea_resident_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10160">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10161">找到 Keyword_south_korea_resident_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10161">A keyword from Keyword_south_korea_resident_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10162">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10162">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10163">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10163">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10164">函数 Func_south_korea_resident_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10164">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10165">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10165">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Korea Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="5b802e18-ba80-44c4-bc83-bf2ad36ae36a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10166">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10166">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_south_korea_resident_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10167">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10167">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10168">National ID card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10168">National ID card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10169">Citizen's Registration Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10169">Citizen's Registration Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10170">Jumin deungnok beonho</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10170">Jumin deungnok beonho</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10171">RRN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10171">RRN</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10172">주민등록번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10172">주민등록번호</span></span>

## <a name="spain-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10173">西班牙驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10173">Spain driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10174">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10174">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10175">八个数字后跟一个字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10175">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10176">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10176">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10177">八个数字后跟一个字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10177">eight digits followed by one character:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10178">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10178">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10179">一个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10179">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10180">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10180">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10181">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10181">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10182">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10182">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10183">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10183">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10184">函数  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10184">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10185">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10185">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10186">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10186">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10187">函数  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10187">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Spain Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5a82922-b501-4f40-8868-341321146aa2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-dni"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10321">西班牙 DNI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10321">Spain DNI</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10322">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10322">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10323">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10323">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10324">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10324">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10325">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10325">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10326">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10326">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10327">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10327">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10328">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10328">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10329">八个数字后跟一个字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10329">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10330">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10330">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10331">七个数字后跟一个字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10331">seven digits followed by one character</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10332">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10332">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10333">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10333">An optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10334">一个检查 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10334">one check letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10335">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10335">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10336">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10336">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10337">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10337">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10338">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10338">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10339">函数  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10339">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10340">找到 的  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10340">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10341">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10341">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10342">函数  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10342">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
      <!-- Spain DNI -->
      <Entity id="8e6251b9-47b4-40e8-a42b-0f80876be192" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10366">西班牙护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10366">Spain passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10367">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10367">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10368">字母和数字的八字符或九字符组合，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10368">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10369">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10369">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10370">字母和数字的八字符或九字符组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10370">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10371">两个数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10371">two digits or letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10372">一个数字或字母 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10372">one digit or letter (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10373">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10373">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10374">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10374">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10375">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10375">Not applicable</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10376">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10376">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10377">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10377">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10378">正则表达式查找  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10378">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10379">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10379">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10380">正则表达式查找 `Regex_spain_eu_passport_date` DD-MM-YYYY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10380">The regular expression `Regex_spain_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD-MM-YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10381">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10381">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10382">正则表达式查找  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10382">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10383">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10383">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Spain Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d17a57de-9fa5-4e9f-85d3-85c26d89686e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10400">números de pasaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10400">números de pasaporte</span></span>

## <a name="spain-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10412">西班牙社会保险号码 (SSN) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10412">Spain social security number (SSN)</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10413">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10413">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10414">11-12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10414">11-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10415">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10415">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10416">11-12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10416">11-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10417">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10417">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10418">可选参数， (正斜) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10418">a forward slash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10419">七到八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10419">seven to eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10420">可选参数， (正斜) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10420">a forward slash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10421">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10421">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10422">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10422">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10423">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10423">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10424">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10424">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10425">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10425">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10426">函数 Func_spanish_social_security_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10426">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10427">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10427">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- - <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10428">找到 的  `Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10428">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10429">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10429">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10430">函数 Func_spanish_social_security_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10430">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10431">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10431">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Spain SSN -->
    <Entity id="5df987c0-8eae-4bce-ace7-b316347f3070" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true" >
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10432">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10432">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_spain_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10433">Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10433">Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10434">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10434">ssn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10435">ssn#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10435">ssn#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10436">socialsecurityno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10436">socialsecurityno</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10437">social security no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10437">social security no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10438">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10438">social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10439">número de la seguridad social</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10439">número de la seguridad social</span></span>

## <a name="spain-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10440">西班牙税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10440">Spain tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10441">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10441">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10442">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10442">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10443">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10443">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10444">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10444">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10445">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10445">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10446">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10446">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10447">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10447">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10448">七个或八个数字以及指定模式中的一个或两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10448">seven or eight digits and one or two letters in the specified pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10449">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10449">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10450">具有西班牙国家身份证的西班牙自然人：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10450">Spanish Natural Persons with a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10451">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10451">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10452">一个小写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10452">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10453">没有西班牙国家身份证的非常驻 Spaniards</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10453">Non-resident Spaniards without a Spain National Identity Card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10454">一个小写字母"L" (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10454">one uppercase letter "L" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10455">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10455">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10456">一个小写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10456">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10457">没有西班牙国家身份证的 14 岁以下的儿童的常驻 Spaniards：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10457">Resident Spaniards under the age of 14 years without a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10458">一个小写字母"K" (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10458">one uppercase letter "K" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10459">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10459">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10460">一个小写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10460">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10461">具有一位用户标识号的百位用户</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10461">Foreigners with a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10462">一个小写字母，"X"、"Y"或"Z" (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10462">one uppercase letter that is "X", "Y", or "Z" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10463">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10463">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10464">一个小写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10464">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10465">没有标识号的百分卡</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10465">Foreigners without a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10466">一个区分大小写的大写字母 ("M") </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10466">one uppercase letter that is "M" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10467">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10467">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10468">一个小写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10468">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10469">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10469">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10470">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10470">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10471">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10471">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10472">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10472">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10473">函数  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10473">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10474">找到 的  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10474">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10475">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10475">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10476">函数  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10476">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Spain Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="10f0d113-b0e1-47dc-872a-a4f45b9376a3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
