## <a name="sql-server-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10507">SQL Server连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10507">SQL Server connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10508">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10508">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10509">字符串"用户 ID"、"用户 ID"、"uid"或"UserId"后跟以下模式中列出的字符和字符串。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10509">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10510">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10510">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10511">字符串"用户 ID"、"用户 ID"、"uid"或"UserId"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10511">the string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10512">1-200 个小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10512">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10513">字符串"Password"或"pwd"，其中"pwd"的前面没有小写字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10513">the string "Password" or "pwd" where "pwd" isn't preceded by a lowercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10514">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10514">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10515">任何不是美元符号的字符 ($) 、百分比符号 (%) 、大于符号 (>) 、符号 (@) 、引号 (") 、分号 (;) 、左大括号 ([) 或左括号 ({) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10515">any character that isn't a dollar sign ($), percent symbol (%), greater than symbol (>), at symbol (@), quotation mark ("), semicolon (;), left brace([), or left bracket ({)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10516">7-128 个字符的任意组合，这些字符不是分号 (;) 、正斜杠 (/) 或引号 (") </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10516">any combination of 7-128 characters that are not a semicolon (;), forward slash (/), or quotation mark (")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10517">分号 (;) 或引号 (") </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10517">a semicolon (;) or quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10518">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10518">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10519">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10519">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10520">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10520">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10521">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10521">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10522">正则表达式CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10522">The regular expression CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10523">未找到CEP_GlobalFilter关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10523">A keyword from CEP_GlobalFilter isn't found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10524">正则表达式CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder找不到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10524">The regular expression CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10525">正则表达式CEP_CommonExampleKeywords找不到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10525">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```sql
<!---SQL Server Connection String>
<Entity id="e76b6205-d3cb-46f2-bd63-c90153f2f97d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_GlobalFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10526">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10526">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_globalfilter"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10527">CEP_GlobalFilter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10527">CEP_GlobalFilter</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10528">some-password</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10528">some-password</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10529">somepassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10529">somepassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10530">secretPassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10530">secretPassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10531">示例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10531">sample</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_passwordplaceholder"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10532">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10532">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10533">此敏感信息类型使用正则表达式（而不是关键字列表）标识这些关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10533">This sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10534">密码或 pwd 后跟 0-2 个空格、一个等号 (=) 、0-2 个空格和一个星号 (\*) -OR-</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10534">Password or pwd followed by 0-2 spaces, an equal sign (=), 0-2 spaces, and an asterisk (\*) -OR-</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10535">密码或 pwd 后跟：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10535">Password or pwd followed by:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10536">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10536">Equal sign (=)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10537">小于符号 (<) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10537">Less than symbol (<)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10538">大写或小写字母、数字、星号 (\*) 、连字符 (-) 、下划线 (_) 或空格字符的 1-200 个字符的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10538">Any combination of 1-200 characters that are upper- or lowercase letters, digits, an asterisk (\*), hyphen (-), underline (_), or whitespace character</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10539">大于符号 (>) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10539">Greater than symbol (>)</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_commonexamplekeywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10540">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10540">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10541">此敏感信息类型使用正则表达式（而不是关键字列表）标识这些关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10541">This sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10542">contoso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10542">contoso</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10543">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10543">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10544">northwind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10544">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10545">沙盒</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10545">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10546">onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10546">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10547">localhost</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10547">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10548">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10548">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10549">testacs。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10549">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10550">com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10550">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10551">s-int。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10551">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10552">net</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10552">net</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10553">瑞典驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10553">Sweden driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10554">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10554">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10555">10 个数字，包含连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10555">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10556">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10556">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10557">10 个数字，包含连字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10557">10 digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10558">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10558">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10559">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10559">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10560">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10560">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10561">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10561">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10562">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10562">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10563">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10563">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10564">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10564">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10565">正则表达式查找  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10565">The regular expression  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10566">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10566">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Sweden Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="70088720-90dd-47f5-805e-5525f3567391" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10699">瑞典国家/身份证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10699">Sweden national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10700">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10700">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10701">10 个或 12 个数字和一个可选分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10701">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10702">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10702">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10703">10 或 12 位数字和可选的分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10703">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10704">两个数字 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10704">two digits (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10705">采用日期格式 YYMMDD 的六位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10705">Six digits in date format YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10706">可选参数"-"或"+" () </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10706">delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10707">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10707">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10708">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10708">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10709">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10709">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10710">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10710">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10711">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10711">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10712">函数 `Func_swedish_national_identifier` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10712">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10713">找到的 `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` 关键字来自</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10713">A keyword from `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10714">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10714">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10715">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10715">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10716">函数 `Func_swedish_national_identifier` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10716">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10717">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10717">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden National ID -->
    <Entity id="f69aaf40-79be-4fac-8f05-fd1910d272c8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10733">personnummer#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10733">personnummer#</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10736">瑞典护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10736">Sweden passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10737">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10737">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10738">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10738">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10739">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10739">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10740">八个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10740">eight consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10741">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10741">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10742">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10742">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10743">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10743">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10744">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10744">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10745">正则表达式Regex_sweden_passport_number找到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10745">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10746">找到或 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keyword_sweden_passport` 找到的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10746">a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_sweden_passport` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10747">正则表达式查找 `Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YY (01 JAN/JAN 12) 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10747">the regular expression `Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date` finds a date in the format DD MMM/MMM YY (01 JAN/JAN 12) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10748">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10748">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10749">正则表达式Regex_sweden_passport_number找到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10749">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10750">找到或 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keyword_sweden_passport` 找到的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10750">a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_sweden_passport` is found.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="ba4e7456-55a9-4d89-9140-c33673553526" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10786">瑞典税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10786">Sweden tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10787">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10787">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10788">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10788">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10789">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10789">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10790">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10790">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10791">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10791">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10792">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10792">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10793">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10793">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10794">10 个数字和指定模式中的符号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10794">10 digits and a symbol in the specified pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10795">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10795">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10796">10 个数字和一个符号：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10796">10 digits and a symbol:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10797">六个数字，对应于 YYMMDD (出生日期) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10797">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10798">加号或减号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10798">a plus sign or minus sign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10799">使标识号唯一的三个数字，其中：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10799">three digits that make the identification number unique where:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10800">对于 1990 以前颁发的数字，第七位和第八位标识出生日期或出生日期的县</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10800">for numbers issued before 1990, the seventh and eighth digit identify the county of birth or foreign-born people</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10801">第九个位置的数字表示性别（男性为奇数或偶数）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10801">the digit in the ninth position indicates gender by either odd for male or even for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10802">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10802">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10803">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10803">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10804">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10804">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10805">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10805">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10806">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10806">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10807">函数  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10807">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10808">找到 的  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10808">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10809">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10809">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10810">函数  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10810">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Sweden Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="139acba0-a5bc-4fbb-876d-f7a493ae8a40" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="swift-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10836">SWIFT 代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10836">SWIFT code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10837">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10837">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10838">四个字母后跟 5-31 个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10838">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10839">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10839">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10840">四个字母后跟 5-31 个字母或数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10840">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10841">四个字母银行 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10841">four-letter bank code (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10842">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10842">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10843">4-28 个字母或数字（基本银行账号 (BBAN)）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10843">4-28 letters or digits (the Basic Bank Account Number (BBAN))</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10844">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10844">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10845">BBAN (一到三个字母或) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10845">one to three letters or digits (remainder of the BBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10846">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10846">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10847">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10847">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10848">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10848">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10849">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10849">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10850">正则表达式 Regex_swift 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10850">The regular expression Regex_swift finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10851">找到 Keyword_swift 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10851">A keyword from Keyword_swift is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="cb2ab58c-9cb8-4c81-baf8-a4e106791df4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_swift" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_swift" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="switzerland-ssn-ahv-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10888">瑞士 SSN AHV 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10888">Switzerland SSN AHV number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10889">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10889">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10890">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10890">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10891">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10891">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10892">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10892">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10893">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10893">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10894">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10894">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10895">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10895">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10896">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10896">13-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10897">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10897">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10898">13 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10898">13-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10899">三个数字 - 756</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10899">three digits - 756</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10900">可选点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10900">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10901">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10901">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10902">可选点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10902">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10903">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10903">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10904">可选点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10904">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10905">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10905">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10906">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10906">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10907">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10907">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10908">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10908">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10909">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10909">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10910">函数Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10910">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10911">找到来自Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10911">A keyword from Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10912">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10912">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10913">函数Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10913">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Swiss SSN AHV Number -->
      <Entity id="277cfa4b-6eaa-4a1b-9492-099dec849971" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_swiss_ssn_ahv_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10915">Keyword_swiss_ssn_AHV_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10915">Keyword_swiss_ssn_AHV_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10917">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10917">ssn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10918">pid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10918">pid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10919">insurance number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10919">insurance number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10920">personalidno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10920">personalidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10921">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10921">social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10922">个人 ID 号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10922">personal id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10923">个人标识号。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10923">personal identification no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10924">insuranceno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10924">insuranceno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10925">uniqueidno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10925">uniqueidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10926">唯一标识号。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10926">unique identification no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10927">avs number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10927">avs number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10933">numéro de sécurité sociale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10933">numéro de sécurité sociale</span></span>


## <a name="taiwan-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10934">台湾国家/地区身份证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10934">Taiwan national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10935">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10935">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10936">一个字母 (英文) 后跟九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10936">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10937">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10937">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10938">一个字母 (英文) 后跟九个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10938">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10939">一个字母 (英语，不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10939">one letter (in English, not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10940">数字"1"或"2"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10940">the digit "1" or "2"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10941">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10941">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10942">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10942">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10943">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10943">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10944">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10944">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10945">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10945">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10946">函数 Func_taiwanese_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10946">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10947">找到 Keyword_taiwanese_national_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10947">A keyword from Keyword_taiwanese_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10948">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10948">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10949">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10949">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10950">函数 Func_taiwanese_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10950">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10951">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10951">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwanese National ID -->
<Entity id="4C7BFC34-8DD1-421D-8FB7-6C6182C2AF03" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwanese_national_id" />
      </Pattern>
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
         <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
       </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10952">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10952">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10953">Keyword_taiwan_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10953">Keyword_taiwan_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10954">身份證字號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10954">身份證字號</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10955">身份證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10955">身份證</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10956">身份證號碼</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10956">身份證號碼</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10957">身份證號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10957">身份證號</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10958">身分證字號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10958">身分證字號</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10959">身分證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10959">身分證</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10960">身分證號碼</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10960">身分證號碼</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10961">身份證號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10961">身份證號</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10962">身分證統一編號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10962">身分證統一編號</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10963">國民身分證統一編號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10963">國民身分證統一編號</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10964">簽名</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10964">簽名</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10965">蓋章</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10965">蓋章</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10966">簽名或蓋章</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10966">簽名或蓋章</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10967">簽章</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10967">簽章</span></span>

## <a name="taiwan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10968">台湾护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10968">Taiwan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10969">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10969">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10970">生物识别护照号码：九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10970">biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10971">非生物识别护照号码：九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10971">non-biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10972">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10972">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10973">生物识别护照号码：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10973">biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10974">字符"3"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10974">the character "3"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10975">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10975">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10976">非生物识别护照号码：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10976">non-biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10977">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10977">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10978">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10978">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10979">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10979">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10980">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10980">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10981">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10981">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10982">正则表达式 Regex_taiwan_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10982">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10983">找到 Keyword_taiwan_passport 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10983">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="e7251cb4-4c2c-41df-963e-924eb3dae04a" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_passport"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_passport"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10984">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10984">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10985">Keyword_taiwan_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10985">Keyword_taiwan_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10986">ROC passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10986">ROC passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10987">Passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10987">Passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10988">Passport no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10988">Passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10989">Passport Num</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10989">Passport Num</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10990">Passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10990">Passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10991">护照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10991">护照</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10992">中華民國護照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10992">中華民國護照</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10993">Zhōnghuá Mínguó hùzhào</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10993">Zhōnghuá Mínguó hùzhào</span></span>

## <a name="taiwan-resident-certificate-arctarc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10994">中国台湾居民证书 (ARC/TARC) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10994">Taiwan-resident certificate (ARC/TARC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10995">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10995">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10996">10 letters and digits</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10996">10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10997">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10997">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10998">10 个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10998">10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-10999">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-10999">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11000">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11000">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11001">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11001">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11002">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11002">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11003">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11003">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11004">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11004">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11005">正则表达式 Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11005">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11006">找到 Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11006">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Resident Certificate (ARC/TARC) -->
<Entity id="48269fec-05ea-46ea-b326-f5623a58c6e9" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="thai-population-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11020">泰语总体标识代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11020">Thai population identification code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11021">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11021">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11022">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11022">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11023">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11023">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11024">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11024">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11025">第一个数字不为零或九</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11025">first digit isn't zero or nine</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11026">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11026">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11027">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11027">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11028">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11028">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11029">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11029">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11030">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11030">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11031">函数Func_Thai_Citizen_Id查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11031">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11032">找到来自Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11032">A keyword from Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11033">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11033">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11034">函数Func_Thai_Citizen_Id查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11034">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Thai Citizen ID -->
-<Entity id="44ca9e86-ead7-4c5d-884a-e2eaa401515e" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11035">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11035">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_thai_citizen_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11036">Keyword_thai_citizen_Id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11036">Keyword_thai_citizen_Id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11037">ID 编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11037">ID Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11038">标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11038">Identification Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11039">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11039">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11040">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11040">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11041">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11041">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11042">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11042">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>

## <a name="turkish-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11043">土耳其国家标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11043">Turkish national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11044">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11044">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11045">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11045">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11046">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11046">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11047">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11047">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11048">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11048">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11049">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11049">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11050">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11050">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11051">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11051">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11052">函数Func_Turkish_National_Id查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11052">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11053">找到来自Keyword_Turkish_National_Id关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11053">A keyword from Keyword_Turkish_National_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11054">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11054">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11055">函数Func_Turkish_National_Id查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11055">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Turkish National Identity -->
-<Entity id="fb621f20-3876-4cfc-acec-8c8e73ca32c7" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11056">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11056">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_turkish_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11057">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11057">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11058">TC Kim且否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11058">TC Kimlik No</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11060">Vatandailal？k nu一s？</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11060">Vatandaşlık numarası</span></span>

## <a name="uk-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11062">英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11062">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11063">driver's license number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11063">driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11064">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11064">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11065">特定格式的 18 个字母和数字组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11065">Combination of 18 letters and digits in the specified format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11066">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11066">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11067">18 个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11067">18 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11068">五个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字"9"来表示字母。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11068">Five letters (not case-sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11069">一个数字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11069">One digit.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11070">日期格式 MMDDY 表示出生日期的五个数字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11070">Five digits in the date format MMDDY for date of birth.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11071">如果驱动程序是男性，则第七个字符将递增 50;对于考试，51 到 62，而不是 01 到 12。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11071">The seventh character is incremented by 50 if driver is female; for exampe, 51 to 62 instead of 01 to 12.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11072">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字"9"来表示字母。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11072">Two letters (not case-sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11073">五个数字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11073">Five digits.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11074">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11074">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11075">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11075">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11076">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11076">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11077">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11077">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11078">函数 `Func_uk_drivers_license` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11078">The function `Func_uk_drivers_license` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11079">找到 的 `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11079">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11080">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11080">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11081">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11081">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11082">函数 `Func_uk_drivers_license` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11082">The function `Func_uk_drivers_license` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11083">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11083">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.K. Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="f93de4be-d94c-40df-a8be-461738047551" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true" >
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-electoral-roll-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11204">英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11204">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11205">roll roll number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11205">electoral roll number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11206">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11206">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11207">两个字母后跟 1-4 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11207">two letters followed by 1-4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11208">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11208">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11209">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟 1-4 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11209">two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by 1-4 numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11210">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11210">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11211">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11211">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11212">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11212">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11213">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11213">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11214">正则表达式 Regex_uk_electoral 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11214">The regular expression Regex_uk_electoral finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11215">找到 Keyword_uk_electoral 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11215">A keyword from Keyword_uk_electoral is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Electoral Number -->
<Entity id="a3eea206-dc0c-4f06-9e22-aa1be3059963" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_uk_electoral" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_electoral" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11216">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11216">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_electoral"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11217">Keyword_uk_electoral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11217">Keyword_uk_electoral</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11218">council nomination</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11218">council nomination</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11219">nomination form</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11219">nomination form</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11220">electoral register</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11220">electoral register</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11221">electoral roll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11221">electoral roll</span></span>


## <a name="uk-national-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11222">英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11222">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11223">national health service number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11223">national health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11224">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11224">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11225">10-17 个数字，通过空格分隔 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11225">10-17 digits separated by spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11226">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11226">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11227">10-17 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11227">10-17 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11228">3 个或 10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11228">either 3 or 10 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11229">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11229">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11230">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11230">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11231">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11231">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11232">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11232">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11233">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11233">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11234">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11234">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11235">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11235">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11236">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11236">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11237">函数 Func_uk_nhs_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11237">The function Func_uk_nhs_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11238">下列其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11238">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11239">找到 Keyword_uk_nhs_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11239">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11240">找到 Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11240">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11241">找到 Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11241">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11242">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11242">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NHS Number -->
<Entity id="3192014e-2a16-44e9-aa69-4b20375c9a78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nhs_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_uk_nhs_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11244">Keyword_uk_nhs_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11244">Keyword_uk_nhs_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11246">nhs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11246">nhs</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11247">health services authority</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11247">health services authority</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11248">health authority</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11248">health authority</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11250">patient id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11250">patient id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11251">patient identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11251">patient identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11252">patient no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11252">patient no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11253">patient number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11253">patient number</span></span>

## <a name="uk-national-insurance-number-nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11260">英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11260">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11261">NINO 保险号码 (NINO) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11261">national insurance number (NINO)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11262">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟国家标识号敏感信息类型中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11262">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11263">它还作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11263">It's also available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11264">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11264">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11265">七个字符或九个字符，用空格或短划线分隔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11265">seven characters or nine characters separated by spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11266">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11266">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11267">两种可能的模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11267">two possible patterns:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11268">两个字母 (有效 NINOs 仅使用此前缀中的某些字符，此模式对此进行验证;不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11268">two letters (valid NINOs use only certain characters in this prefix, which this pattern validates; not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11269">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11269">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11270">"A"、B、C 或"D" (类似前缀，后缀中只允许某些字符;不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11270">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D' (like the prefix, only certain characters are allowed in the suffix; not case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11271">或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11271">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11272">两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11272">two letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11273">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11273">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11274">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11274">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11275">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11275">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11276">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11276">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11277">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11277">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11278">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11278">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11279">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11279">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11280">"A"、"B"、"C"或"D"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11280">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D'</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11281">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11281">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11282">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11282">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11283">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11283">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11284">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11284">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11285">函数 Func_uk_nino 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11285">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11286">找到 Keyword_uk_nino 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11286">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11287">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11287">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11288">函数 Func_uk_nino 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11288">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.K. NINO -->
    <Entity id="16c07343-c26f-49d2-a987-3daf717e94cc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11295">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11295">social security number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11297">medical application</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11297">medical application</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11298">social insurance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11298">social insurance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11299">medical attention</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11299">medical attention</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11300">social security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11300">social security</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11301">great britain</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11301">great britain</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11302">NI 数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11302">NI Number</span></span>

## <a name="uk-unique-taxpayer-reference-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11310">英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11310">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11311">唯一的纳税参考编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11311">Unique Taxpayer Reference Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11312">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11312">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11313">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11313">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11314">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11314">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11315">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11315">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11316">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11316">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11317">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11317">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11318">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11318">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11319">不带空格和分隔符的 10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11319">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>


### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11320">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11320">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11321">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11321">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11322">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11322">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11323">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11323">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11324">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11324">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11325">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11325">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11326">函数  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11326">The function  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11327">找到 的  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11327">A keyword from  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- U.K. Unique Taxpayer Reference Number -->
      <Entity id="ad4a8116-0db8-439a-b545-6d967642f0ec" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11328">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11328">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11329">Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11329">Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11330">tax number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11330">tax number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11339">一些#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11339">taxidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11340">一些#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11340">taxidnumber#</span></span>
