## <a name="us-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11347">美国银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11347">U.S. bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11348">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11348">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11349">6-17 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11349">6-17 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11350">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11350">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11351">6-17 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11351">6-17 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11352">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11352">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11353">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11353">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11354">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11354">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11355">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11355">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11356">正则表达式 Regex_usa_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11356">The regular expression Regex_usa_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11357">找到 Keyword_usa_Bank_Account 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11357">A keyword from Keyword_usa_Bank_Account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="a2ce32a8-f935-4bb6-8e96-2a5157672e2c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_usa_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_usa_Bank_Account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11387">美国驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11387">U.S. driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11388">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11388">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11389">取决于州</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11389">Depends on the state</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11390">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11390">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11391">取决于州 -例如，纽约：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11391">depends on the state - for example, New York:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11392">9 个数字，格式为 ddd ddd ddd 将匹配。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11392">nine digits formatted like ddd ddd ddd will match.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11393">9 个数字（如 ddddddddd）不匹配。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11393">nine digits like ddddddddd will not match.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11394">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11394">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11395">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11395">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11396">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11396">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11397">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11397">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11398">函数 Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11398">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11399">找到 Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11399">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11400">找到 Keyword_us_drivers_license 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11400">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11401">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11401">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11402">函数 Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11402">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11403">找到 Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11403">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11404">找到 Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11404">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11405">未找到 Keyword_us_drivers_license 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11405">No keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="dfeb356f-61cd-459e-bf0f-7c6d28b458c6 patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-individual-taxpayer-identification-number-itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11503">ITIN 中美国个人纳税 (标识号) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11503">U.S. individual taxpayer identification number (ITIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11504">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11504">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11505">九个数字，以"9"开头，包含"7"或"8"作为第四个数字，可选格式为空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11505">nine digits that start with a "9" and contain a "7" or "8" as the fourth digit, optionally formatted with spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11506">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11506">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11507">格式化：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11507">formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11508">数字"9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11508">the digit "9"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11509">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11509">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11510">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11510">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11511">"7"或"8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11511">a "7" or "8"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11512">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11512">a digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11513">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11513">a space, or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11514">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11514">four digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11515">unformatted：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11515">unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11516">数字"9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11516">the digit "9"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11517">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11517">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11518">"7"或"8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11518">a "7" or "8"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11519">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11519">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11520">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11520">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11521">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11521">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11522">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11522">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11523">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11523">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11524">函数 Func_formatted_itin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11524">The function Func_formatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11525">找到 Keyword_itin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11525">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11526">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11526">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11527">函数 Func_unformatted_itin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11527">The function Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11528">找到 Keyword_itin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11528">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11529">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11529">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11530">函数Func_formatted_itin或Func_unformatted_itin找到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11530">The function Func_formatted_itin or Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN) -->
    <Entity id="e55e2a32-f92d-4985-a35d-a0b269eb687b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11531">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11531">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11532">Keyword_itin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11532">Keyword_itin</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11533">将</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11533">taxpayer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11534">tax id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11534">tax id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11535">tax identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11535">tax identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11536">itin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11536">itin</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11537">i.t.i.n.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11537">i.t.i.n.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11538">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11538">ssn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11539">tin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11539">tin</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11540">social security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11540">social security</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11541">tax payer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11541">tax payer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11542">itins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11542">itins</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11543">已</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11543">taxid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11544">individual taxpayer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11544">individual taxpayer</span></span>


## <a name="us-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11545">SSN (美国社会保险) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11545">U.S. social security number (SSN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11546">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11546">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11547">九个数字，可能采用格式化或无格式模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11547">nine digits, which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11548">如果在 2011 年中旬前发布，则 SSN 具有强格式，即数字的某部分必须介于某个有效的范围中（但是没有校验和）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11548">If issued before mid-2011, an SSN has strong formatting where certain parts of the number must fall within certain ranges to be valid (but there's no checksum).</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11549">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11549">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11550">四个函数以四种不同的模式查找 SSN：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11550">four functions look for SSNs in four different patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11551">Func_ssn 查找具有 2011 年以前使用短划线或空格格式化的强格式的 SSN（ddd-dd-dddd 或 ddd dd dddd）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11551">Func_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11552">Func_unformatted_ssn 查找具有 2011 年以前未格式化为 9 个连续数字的强格式的 SSN (ddddddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11552">Func_unformatted_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11553">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 查找 2011 年后使用短划线或空格（ddd-dd-dddd 或 ddd dd dddd）格式化的 SSN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11553">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11554">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 查找 2011 年后未格式化为 9 个连续数字 (ddddddddd) 的 SSN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11554">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11555">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11555">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11556">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11556">No</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11557">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11557">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11558">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11558">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11559">函数 Func_ssn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11559">The function Func_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11560">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11560">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11561">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11561">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11562">函数 Func_unformatted_ssn 查找与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11562">The function Func_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11563">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11563">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11564">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11564">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11565">函数 Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11565">The function Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11566">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11566">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11567">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11567">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11568">函数 Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11568">The function Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11569">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11569">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>


```xml
<!-- U.S. Social Security Number (SSN) -->
  <Entity id="a44669fe-0d48-453d-a9b1-2cc83f2cba77" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_formatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="55">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
  </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11574">social security#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11574">social security #</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11576">social security no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11576">social security no</span></span>

## <a name="us--uk-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11584">美国/英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11584">U.S. / U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11585">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11585">passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11586">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11586">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11587">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11587">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11588">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11588">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11589">九个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11589">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11590">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11590">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11591">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11591">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11592">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11592">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11593">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11593">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11594">函数 Func_usa_uk_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11594">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11595">找到 或 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11595">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11596">找到的 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 关键字来自</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11596">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11597">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11597">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11598">函数 Func_usa_uk_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11598">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11599">找到 或 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11599">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.S. / U.K. Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="178ec42a-18b4-47cc-85c7-d62c92fd67f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="ukraine-passport-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11615">乌克兰护照国内</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11615">Ukraine passport domestic</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11616">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11616">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11617">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11617">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11618">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11618">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11619">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11619">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11620">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11620">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11621">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11621">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11622">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11622">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11623">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11623">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11624">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11624">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11625">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11625">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11626">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11626">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11627">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11627">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11628">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11628">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11629">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11629">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11630">正则表达式Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11630">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11631">找到来自Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11631">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport Domestic -->
      <Entity id="1817a540-221f-4459-9202-3bd78b81d803" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11632">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11632">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ukraine_passport_domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11633">Keyword_ukraine_passport_domestic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11633">Keyword_ukraine_passport_domestic</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11634">乌克兰护照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11634">ukraine passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11635">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11635">passport number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11637">паспорт України</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11637">паспорт України</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11638">номер паспорта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11638">номер паспорта</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11639">персональний</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11639">персональний</span></span>


## <a name="ukraine-passport-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11640">乌克兰护照国际</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11640">Ukraine passport international</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11641">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11641">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11642">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11642">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11643">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11643">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11644">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11644">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11645">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11645">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11646">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11646">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11647">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11647">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11648">八字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11648">eight-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11649">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11649">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11650">八字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11650">eight-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11651">两个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11651">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11652">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11652">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11653">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11653">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11654">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11654">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11655">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11655">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11656">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11656">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11657">正则表达式Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11657">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="7e6b4-11658">找到来自Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7e6b4-11658">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport International -->
      <Entity id="cfbe032d-22e0-4f28-ab68-d66e9641f1e2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
